translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the eight liberations, nor can he cultivate the eight superior [meditations], nine sequential concentrations, or ten universal bases;

original: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the door of emptiness liberation, nor can he cultivate the signless or wishless door of liberation;

original: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
translated: this bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the door of concentration, nor is he able to cultivate the door of mnemonic spells;🔽this bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the ten powers of the Buddha, nor is he able to cultivate the four forms of fearlessness, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha;

original: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
translated: this bodhisattva is unable to cultivate omniscience, nor is he able to cultivate the cognition of the path, nor the cognition of all modes.🔽In the Great Heap of Jewels Sūtra, the Buddha said to Subhūti: Subhūti, in the future there will be bhikṣus who will not cultivate the five eyes, nor will they cultivate the six supernormal powers;🔽they will not cultivate the three doors of liberation, nor will they cultivate the eight liberations, the nine successive meditative absorptions, or the ten totalities;

original: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
translated: they will not cultivate the ten powers of the Buddha, nor will they cultivate the four forms of fearlessness, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, or the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha;

original: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
translated: they will not cultivate omniscience, nor will they cultivate the cognition of the path, nor the cognition of all modes.🔽In the Great Heap of Jewels Sūtra, the Buddha said to Subhūti: Subhūti, in the future there will be bhikṣus who will not cultivate the five eyes, nor will they cultivate the six supernormal powers;

original: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百二十三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯初分真如品第四十七之四「諸天子！
analyzed: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百二十三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯初分真如品第四十七之四「諸天子！
translated: they will not cultivate the three doors of liberation, nor will they cultivate the eight liberations, the nine successive meditative absorptions, or the ten totalities;

original: 若菩薩為攝取三摩地門故行，為棄捨三摩地門故行，為攝取陀羅尼門故行，為棄捨陀羅尼門故行，是菩薩不能修般若波羅蜜多，亦不能修靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；
analyzed: 若菩薩為攝取三摩地門故行，為棄捨三摩地門故行，為攝取陀羅尼門故行，為棄捨陀羅尼門故行，是菩薩不能修般若波羅蜜多，亦不能修靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；
translated: If bodhisattvas practice in order to grasp the doors of concentration and liberation, or in order to abandon the doors of concentration and liberation, if they practice in order to grasp the dhāraṇī gateways, or in order to abandon the dhāraṇī gateways, these bodhisattvas are unable to cultivate prajñā-pāramitā, and also unable to cultivate the perfections of concentration, vigor, patience, morality, and giving;

original: 是菩薩不能證內空，亦不能證外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證內空，亦不能證外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；
translated: these bodhisattvas are unable to realize inner emptiness, and also unable to realize outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature, and emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence;

original: 是菩薩不能證真如，亦不能證法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證真如，亦不能證法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot realize suchness, nor can he realize the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, birthlessness nature, dharma determination, dharma abode, ultimate reality, space realm, or inconceivable realm;

original: 是菩薩不能修四念住，亦不能修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修四念住，亦不能修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, nor can he cultivate the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural powers, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, or eightfold noble path;

original: 是菩薩不能證苦聖諦，亦不能證集、滅、道聖諦；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證苦聖諦，亦不能證集、滅、道聖諦；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot realize the noble truth of suffering, nor can he realize the noble truths of the accumulation, cessation, or path of suffering;

original: 是菩薩不能修四靜慮，亦不能修四無量、四無色定；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修四靜慮，亦不能修四無量、四無色定；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four concentrations, nor can he cultivate the four immeasurable [minds] or four formless concentrations;

original: 是菩薩不能修八解脫，亦不能修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修八解脫，亦不能修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the eight liberations, nor can he cultivate the eight superior [meditations], nine sequential concentrations, or ten universal bases;

original: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the emptiness liberation gate, nor can he cultivate the signless or wishless liberation gates;

original: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
translated: This bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the five eyes, nor is he able to cultivate the six supernormal powers;

original: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
translated: this bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the door of concentration, nor is he able to cultivate the door of mnemonic spells;

original: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
translated: this bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the ten powers of the Buddha, nor is he able to cultivate the four forms of fearlessness, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha;

original: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
translated: this bodhisattva is unable to cultivate omniscience, nor is he able to cultivate the cognition of the path, nor the cognition of all modes.

original: 「諸天子！
analyzed: 「諸天子！
translated: Celestial sons!

original: 若菩薩為攝取佛十力故行，為棄捨佛十力故行，為攝取四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法故行，為棄捨四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法故行，是菩薩不能修般若波羅蜜多，亦不能修靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；
analyzed: 若菩薩為攝取佛十力故行，為棄捨佛十力故行，為攝取四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法故行，為棄捨四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法故行，是菩薩不能修般若波羅蜜多，亦不能修靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；
translated: If bodhisattvas practice in order to grasp the Buddha's ten powers and abandon the Buddha's ten powers, if they practice in order to grasp the four forms of fearlessness, the four unhindered understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha and abandon the four forms of fearlessness and up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha, these bodhisattvas are unable to cultivate prajñā-pāramitā, and also unable to cultivate dhyāna, vīrya, kṣānti, śīla, and dāna-pāramitā;

original: 是菩薩不能證內空，亦不能證外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；🔽是菩薩不能證真如，亦不能證法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證內空，亦不能證外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空； 是菩薩不能證真如，亦不能證法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot realize inner emptiness, nor can he realize outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of common characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature, or emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence;🔽This bodhisattva cannot realize suchness, nor can he realize the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, nature of detachment from birth, dharma determination, dharma abode, reality limit, space realm, or inconceivable realm;

original: 是菩薩不能修四念住，亦不能修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修四念住，亦不能修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, nor can he cultivate the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural powers, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, or eightfold noble path;

original: 是菩薩不能證苦聖諦，亦不能證集、滅、道聖諦；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證苦聖諦，亦不能證集、滅、道聖諦；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot realize the noble truth of suffering, nor can he realize the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path of suffering;

original: 是菩薩不能修四靜慮，亦不能修四無量、四無色定；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修四靜慮，亦不能修四無量、四無色定；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four meditations, nor can he cultivate the four immeasurable [minds] and four formless concentrations;

original: 是菩薩不能修八解脫，亦不能修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修八解脫，亦不能修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the eight liberations, nor can he cultivate the eight bases of overcoming, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases;

original: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the door of liberation of emptiness, nor can he cultivate the doors of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness;

original: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the five eyes, nor can he cultivate the six supernormal knowledges;

analyzed: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the door of concentration, nor can he cultivate the dhāraṇī door;

original: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the ten powers of the Buddha, nor can he cultivate the four fearlessnesses, four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha;

original: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
translated: This bodhisattva is unable to cultivate omniscience, nor is he able to cultivate the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects.

original: 「諸天子！
analyzed: 「諸天子！
translated: Celestial sons!

translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, nor can he cultivate the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, or eightfold noble path;

original: 「諸天子！

original: 若菩薩為攝取獨覺菩提故行，為棄捨獨覺菩提故行，是菩薩不能修般若波羅蜜多，亦不能修靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；
analyzed: 若菩薩為攝取獨覺菩提故行，為棄捨獨覺菩提故行，是菩薩不能修般若波羅蜜多，亦不能修靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；
translated: If a bodhisattva practices in order to grasp at the pratyekabuddha enlightenment and practices in order to abandon the pratyekabuddha enlightenment, this bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the perfection of wisdom, nor is he able to cultivate the perfections of meditative concentration, vigor, patience, morality, and giving;

original: 是菩薩不能證內空，亦不能證外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證內空，亦不能證外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；
translated: this bodhisattva is unable to realize inner emptiness, nor is he able to realize outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of non-dispersal, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of general characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature of non-apprehension, and emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-apprehension.

original: 是菩薩不能證真如，亦不能證法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證真如，亦不能證法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot realize suchness, nor can he realize the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, birthlessness nature, dharma determination, dharma abode, ultimate reality, space realm, or inconceivable realm;

original: 是菩薩不能修四念住，亦不能修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修四念住，亦不能修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, nor can he cultivate the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural powers, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, or eightfold noble path;

original: 是菩薩不能證苦聖諦，亦不能證集、滅、道聖諦；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證苦聖諦，亦不能證集、滅、道聖諦；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot realize the noble truth of suffering, nor can he realize the noble truths of the accumulation, cessation, or path [of suffering];

original: 是菩薩不能修四靜慮，亦不能修四無量、四無色定；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修四靜慮，亦不能修四無量、四無色定；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four concentrations, nor can he cultivate the four immeasurable [minds] or four formless concentrations;

original: 是菩薩不能修八解脫，亦不能修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修八解脫，亦不能修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the eight liberations, nor can he cultivate the eight superior [meditations], nine sequential concentrations, or ten universal bases;

original: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the emptiness liberation gate, nor can he cultivate the signless or wishless liberation gates;

original: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
translated: This bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the five eyes, nor is he able to cultivate the six supernormal knowledges;

original: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
translated: This bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the door of concentration, nor is he able to cultivate the door of dhāraṇī;

original: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
translated: This bodhisattva is unable to cultivate the ten powers of the Buddha, nor is he able to cultivate the four fearlessnesses, four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha;

original: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
translated: This bodhisattva is unable to cultivate omniscience, nor is he able to cultivate the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects.

original: 「諸天子！
analyzed: 「諸天子！
translated: Celestial sons!

original: 若菩薩為攝取一切智故行，為棄捨一切智故行，為攝取道相智、一切相智故行，為棄捨道相智、一切相智故行，是菩薩不能修般若波羅蜜多，亦不能修靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；
analyzed: 若菩薩為攝取一切智故行，為棄捨一切智故行，為攝取道相智、一切相智故行，為棄捨道相智、一切相智故行，是菩薩不能修般若波羅蜜多，亦不能修靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多；
translated: If a bodhisattva practices in order to grasp omniscience, practices in order to abandon omniscience, practices in order to grasp the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects, practices in order to abandon the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects, this bodhisattva is unable to cultivate prajñā-pāramitā, nor is he able to cultivate the perfections of concentration, vigor, patience, morality, and giving;

original: 是菩薩不能證內空，亦不能證外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；🔽是菩薩不能證真如，亦不能證法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證內空，亦不能證外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空； 是菩薩不能證真如，亦不能證法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot realize inner emptiness, nor can he realize outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of common characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature, or emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence;🔽This bodhisattva cannot realize suchness, nor can he realize the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, nature of detachment from birth, dharma determination, dharma abode, reality limit, space realm, or inconceivable realm;

original: 是菩薩不能修四念住，亦不能修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修四念住，亦不能修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, nor can he cultivate the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural powers, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, or eightfold noble path;

original: 是菩薩不能證苦聖諦，亦不能證集、滅、道聖諦；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能證苦聖諦，亦不能證集、滅、道聖諦；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot realize the noble truth of suffering, nor can he realize the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path of suffering;

original: 是菩薩不能修四靜慮，亦不能修四無量、四無色定；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修四靜慮，亦不能修四無量、四無色定；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the four meditations, nor can he cultivate the four immeasurable [minds] and four formless concentrations;

original: 是菩薩不能修八解脫，亦不能修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修八解脫，亦不能修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the eight liberations, nor can he cultivate the eight bases of overcoming, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases;

original: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修空解脫門，亦不能修無相、無願解脫門；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the door of emptiness liberation, nor can he cultivate the signless and wishless liberation doors;

original: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修五眼，亦不能修六神通；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the five eyes, nor can he cultivate the six supernormal knowledges;

original: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修三摩地門，亦不能修陀羅尼門；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the door of concentration, nor can he cultivate the dhāraṇī door;

original: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修佛十力，亦不能修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
translated: This bodhisattva cannot cultivate the ten powers of the Buddha, nor can he cultivate the four fearlessnesses, four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and eighteen distinctive abilities unique to the Buddha;

original: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
analyzed: 是菩薩不能修一切智，亦不能修道相智、一切相智。
translated: This bodhisattva is unable to cultivate omniscience, nor is he able to cultivate the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects.

original: 」爾時，具壽善現白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時，具壽善現白佛言：
translated: At that time, Subhūti addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順一切法。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順一切法。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with all dharmas.

original: 此深妙法隨順何等一切法？
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順何等一切法？
translated: To which all dharmas does this profound and wondrous Dharma accord?

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順般若波羅蜜多，亦隨順靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順般若波羅蜜多，亦隨順靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with prajñā-pāramitā, and also accords with dhyāna, vīrya, kṣānti, śīla, and dāna-pāramitā.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順內空，亦隨順外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順內空，亦隨順外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with inner emptiness, and also accords with outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of immutability, emptiness of inherent nature, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of common characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of self-nature, and emptiness of the nature of self-nature.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順真如，亦隨順法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順真如，亦隨順法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with suchness, and also accords with the dharma realm, the nature of dharmas, the nature of non-falseness, the nature of immutability, the nature of equality, the nature of detachment from arising, the determination of dharmas, the abiding of dharmas, the ultimate reality, the space element, and the inconceivable realm.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順四念住，亦隨順四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順四念住，亦隨順四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with the four establishments of mindfulness, and also accords with the four right efforts, the four bases of supernatural powers, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順苦聖諦，亦隨順集、滅、道聖諦。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順苦聖諦，亦隨順集、滅、道聖諦。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with the noble truth of suffering, and also accords with the noble truths of the arising of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path leading to the cessation of suffering.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順四靜慮，亦隨順四無量、四無色定。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順四靜慮，亦隨順四無量、四無色定。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with the four meditative states of absorption, and also accords with the four immeasurable [minds] and the four formless concentrations.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順八解脫，亦隨順八勝處、九次第定、十遍處。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順八解脫，亦隨順八勝處、九次第定、十遍處。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with the eight liberations, and also accords with the eight bases of mastery, the nine successive stages of meditative absorption, and the ten universal bases.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順空解脫門，亦隨順無相、無願解脫門。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順空解脫門，亦隨順無相、無願解脫門。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with the door of liberation of emptiness, and also accords with the doors of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順五眼，亦隨順六神通。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順五眼，亦隨順六神通。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with the five eyes, and also accords with the six supernormal cognitive abilities.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順三摩地門，亦隨順陀羅尼門。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順三摩地門，亦隨順陀羅尼門。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with the door of meditative absorption, and also accords with the dhāraṇī gateway.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順佛十力，亦隨順四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順佛十力，亦隨順四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with the ten powers of the Buddha, and also accords with the four fearlessnesses, four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha that are not shared by others.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法隨順一切智，亦隨順道相智、一切相智。
analyzed: 此深妙法隨順一切智，亦隨順道相智、一切相智。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma accords with omniscience, and also accords with the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法都無有礙。
analyzed: 此深妙法都無有礙。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma is completely unobstructed.

original: 此深妙法於何無礙？
analyzed: 此深妙法於何無礙？
translated: With regard to what is this profound and wondrous Dharma unobstructed?

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法於色無礙，於受、想、行、識無礙。
analyzed: 此深妙法於色無礙，於受、想、行、識無礙。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma is unobstructed with regard to form, and is unobstructed with regard to feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法於眼處無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無礙。
analyzed: 此深妙法於眼處無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意處無礙。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma is unobstructed with regard to the eye sense base, and is unobstructed with regard to the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense bases.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法於色處無礙，於聲、香、味、觸、法處無礙。
analyzed: 此深妙法於色處無礙，於聲、香、味、觸、法處無礙。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma is unobstructed with regard to the form sense base, and is unobstructed with regard to the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma sense bases.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法於眼界無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意界無礙。
analyzed: 此深妙法於眼界無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意界無礙。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma is unobstructed in the eye-element, and unobstructed in the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind-elements.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法於色界無礙，於聲、香、味、觸、法界無礙。
analyzed: 此深妙法於色界無礙，於聲、香、味、觸、法界無礙。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma is unobstructed in the form-element, and unobstructed in the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma-elements.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法於眼識界無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界無礙。
analyzed: 此深妙法於眼識界無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界無礙。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma is unobstructed in the eye-consciousness-element, and unobstructed in the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind-consciousness-elements.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法於眼觸無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸無礙。
analyzed: 此深妙法於眼觸無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸無礙。
translated: This profound and wondrous Dharma is unobstructed in eye-contact, and unobstructed in ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind-contact.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 此深妙法於眼觸為緣所生諸受無礙，於耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受無礙。

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！

analyzed: 「世尊！

translated: this profound and wondrous Dharma is utterly without traces.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 色足迹不可得故，受、想、行、識足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 色足迹不可得故，受、想、行、識足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of form are unobtainable, and because the traces of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness are unobtainable.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 眼處足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意處足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 眼處足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意處足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the eye sense base are unobtainable, and because the traces of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind sense bases are unobtainable.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 色處足迹不可得故，聲、香、味、觸、法處足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 色處足迹不可得故，聲、香、味、觸、法處足迹不可得故。
translated: Because the traces of the form realm cannot be attained, the traces of the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms cannot be attained.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 眼界足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意界足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 眼界足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意界足迹不可得故。
translated: Because the traces of the eye realm cannot be attained, the traces of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms cannot be attained.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 色界足迹不可得故，聲、香、味、觸、法界足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 色界足迹不可得故，聲、香、味、觸、法界足迹不可得故。
translated: Because the traces of the form realm cannot be attained, the traces of the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma realms cannot be attained.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 眼識界足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 眼識界足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界足迹不可得故。
translated: Because the traces of the eye consciousness realm cannot be attained, the traces of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness realms cannot be attained.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 眼觸足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 眼觸足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸足迹不可得故。
translated: Because the traces of eye contact cannot be attained, the traces of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact cannot be attained.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 眼觸為緣所生諸受足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 眼觸為緣所生諸受足迹不可得故，耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of eye contact as a condition giving rise to various feelings cannot be apprehended, and because the traces of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact as a condition giving rise to various feelings cannot be apprehended.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 地界足迹不可得故，水、火、風、空、識界足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 地界足迹不可得故，水、火、風、空、識界足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the earth element cannot be apprehended, and because the traces of the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements cannot be apprehended.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 無明足迹不可得故，行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 無明足迹不可得故，行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of ignorance cannot be apprehended, and because the traces of volitional activity, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death cannot be apprehended.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 布施波羅蜜多足迹不可得故，淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 布施波羅蜜多足迹不可得故，淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the perfection of generosity cannot be apprehended, and because the traces of the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, concentration, and wisdom cannot be apprehended.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 內空足迹不可得故，外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 內空足迹不可得故，外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空足迹不可得故。
translated: Because the traces of inner emptiness cannot be attained, and the traces of outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of unchanging nature, emptiness of inherent nature, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of common characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of self-nature, and emptiness of the nature of non-existence cannot be attained.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 真如足迹不可得故，法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 真如足迹不可得故，法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界足迹不可得故。
translated: Because the traces of suchness cannot be attained, and the traces of the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, nature of detachment from birth, dharma determination, dharma abode, reality limit, space element, and inconceivable element cannot be attained.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 四念住足迹不可得故，四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 四念住足迹不可得故，四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the four establishments of mindfulness are unobtainable, and because the traces of the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path are unobtainable.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 苦聖諦足迹不可得故，集、滅、道聖諦足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 苦聖諦足迹不可得故，集、滅、道聖諦足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the noble truths of suffering, accumulation, cessation, and the path are unobtainable.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 四靜慮足迹不可得故，四無量、四無色定足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 四靜慮足迹不可得故，四無量、四無色定足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the four concentrations are unobtainable, and because the traces of the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations are unobtainable.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 八解脫足迹不可得故，八勝處、九次第定、十遍處足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 八解脫足迹不可得故，八勝處、九次第定、十遍處足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the eight liberations are unobtainable, and because the traces of the eight superior realms, nine successive concentrations, and ten universal bases are unobtainable.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 空解脫門足迹不可得故，無相、無願解脫門足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 空解脫門足迹不可得故，無相、無願解脫門足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the gate of liberation of emptiness are unobtainable, and because the traces of the gate of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness are unobtainable.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 五眼足迹不可得故，六神通足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 五眼足迹不可得故，六神通足迹不可得故。
translated: because the traces of the five eyes are unobtainable, and because the traces of the six supernatural powers are unobtainable.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!Here is the text with the alignment mistakes fixed and the English translations updated to match the Sanskrit:

original: 三摩地門足迹不可得故，陀羅尼門足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 三摩地門足迹不可得故，陀羅尼門足迹不可得故。
translated: because the bases of the supernatural powers cannot be apprehended, and because the bases of the dhāraṇī doors cannot be apprehended.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-honored One!

original: 佛十力足迹不可得故，四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 佛十力足迹不可得故，四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法足迹不可得故。
translated: because the ten powers of the Buddha cannot be apprehended, and because the four kinds of fearlessness, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha cannot be apprehended.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-honored One!

original: 預流果足迹不可得故，一來、不還、阿羅漢果足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 預流果足迹不可得故，一來、不還、阿羅漢果足迹不可得故。
translated: because the fruit of entering the stream cannot be apprehended, and because the fruits of the once-returner, non-returner, and arhat cannot be apprehended.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-honored One!

original: 獨覺菩提足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 獨覺菩提足迹不可得故。
translated: because pratyekabuddha enlightenment cannot be apprehended.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-honored One!

original: 一切智足迹不可得故，道相智、一切相智足迹不可得故。
analyzed: 一切智足迹不可得故，道相智、一切相智足迹不可得故。
translated: because omniscience cannot be apprehended, and because the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects cannot be apprehended.

original: 」時，欲、色界諸天子復白佛言：
analyzed: 」時，欲、色界諸天子復白佛言：
translated: Then the sons of the gods from the desire and form realms again said to the Buddha:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-honored One!

original: 上座善現隨如來生，佛真弟子。
analyzed: 上座善現隨如來生，佛真弟子。
translated: The elder Subhūti is a true disciple of the Tathāgata who has been born together with him.

original: 所以者何？
analyzed: 所以者何？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 上座善現諸所說法，一切皆與空相應故。
analyzed: 上座善現諸所說法，一切皆與空相應故。
translated: All the teachings spoken by the elder Subhūti are in accord with emptiness.

original: 」爾時，善現告欲、色界諸天子言：
analyzed: 」爾時，善現告欲、色界諸天子言：
translated: At that time, Subhūti said to the gods of the desire and form realms:

original: 「汝諸天子說我善現隨如來生，佛真弟子，云何善現隨如來生？
analyzed: 「汝諸天子說我善現隨如來生，佛真弟子，云何善現隨如來生？
translated: You gods say that I, Subhūti, have been born following the Tathāgata, that I am a true disciple of the Buddha. How have I been born following the Tathāgata?

original: 謂隨如來真如生故。
analyzed: 謂隨如來真如生故。
translated: It is because I have been born following the true suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: 所以者何？🔽如來真如無來無去，上座善現真如亦爾，無來無去，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 所以者何？ 如來真如無來無去，上座善現真如亦爾，無來無去，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Why is it so?🔽The true suchness of the Tathāgata is without coming or going, and the true suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this, without coming or going. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti has been born following the Tathāgata.

original: 「復次，如來真如即一切法真如，一切法真如即如來真如，如是真如無真如性，亦無不真如性，上座善現真如亦爾，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 「復次，如來真如即一切法真如，一切法真如即如來真如，如是真如無真如性，亦無不真如性，上座善現真如亦爾，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Furthermore, the true suchness of the Tathāgata is the true suchness of all dharmas, and the true suchness of all dharmas is the true suchness of the Tathāgata. Such true suchness has no nature of true suchness, and also no nature of not true suchness. The true suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti has been born following the Tathāgata.🔽Here is the corrected and aligned text:

original: 「復次，如來真如常住為相，上座善現真如亦爾，常住為相，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 「復次，如來真如常住為相，上座善現真如亦爾，常住為相，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the Tathāgata is characterized by permanence, and the suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this, characterized by permanence. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti is born following the Tathāgata.

original: 「復次，如來真如無變異無分別，遍諸法轉，上座善現真如亦爾，無變異無分別，遍諸法轉，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 「復次，如來真如無變異無分別，遍諸法轉，上座善現真如亦爾，無變異無分別，遍諸法轉，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the Tathāgata is without change or discrimination, pervading all dharmas, and the suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this, without change or discrimination, pervading all dharmas. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti is born following the Tathāgata.

original: 「復次，如來真如無所罣礙，一切法真如亦無所罣礙，若如來真如，若一切法真如，同一真如，無二無別、無造無作，如是真如常真如相，無時非真如相，以常真如相、無時非真如相故無二無別，上座善現真如亦爾，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 「復次，如來真如無所罣礙，一切法真如亦無所罣礙，若如來真如，若一切法真如，同一真如，無二無別、無造無作，如是真如常真如相，無時非真如相，以常真如相、無時非真如相故無二無別，上座善現真如亦爾，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the Tathāgata is unobstructed, and the suchness of all dharmas is also unobstructed. The suchness of the Tathāgata and the suchness of all dharmas are the same suchness, non-dual and non-distinct, uncreated and unconditioned. Such suchness is always characterized by suchness, never not characterized by suchness. Because it is always characterized by suchness, never not characterized by suchness, it is non-dual and non-distinct. The suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti is born together with the Tathāgata.

original: 「復次，如來真如於一切處，無憶念無分別，上座善現真如亦爾，於一切處無憶念無分別，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 「復次，如來真如於一切處，無憶念無分別，上座善現真如亦爾，於一切處無憶念無分別，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the Tathāgata is without recollection or discrimination in all places, and the suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this, without recollection or discrimination in all places. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti is born together with the Tathāgata.

original: 「復次，如來真如無別無異、不可得，上座善現真如亦爾，無別無異、不可得，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 「復次，如來真如無別無異、不可得，上座善現真如亦爾，無別無異、不可得，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the Tathāgata is without distinction, without difference, and cannot be attained. The suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this, without distinction, without difference, and cannot be attained. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti is born together with the Tathāgata.

original: 「復次，如來真如不離一切法真如，一切法真如不離如來真如，如是真如常真如相，無時非真如相，上座善現真如亦爾，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 「復次，如來真如不離一切法真如，一切法真如不離如來真如，如是真如常真如相，無時非真如相，上座善現真如亦爾，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the Tathāgata is not apart from the suchness of all dharmas, and the suchness of all dharmas is not apart from the suchness of the Tathāgata. Such suchness is always the characteristic of suchness, never not the characteristic of suchness. The suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti is born together with the Tathāgata.

original: 雖說隨生而無所隨生，以善現真如不異佛故。
analyzed: 雖說隨生而無所隨生，以善現真如不異佛故。
translated: Although it is said that he is born together, he is not born together with anything, because the suchness of Subhūti is no different from the Buddha's suchness.

original: 「復次，如來真如非過去非未來非現在，一切法真如亦非過去非未來非現在，上座善現真如亦爾，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 「復次，如來真如非過去非未來非現在，一切法真如亦非過去非未來非現在，上座善現真如亦爾，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the Tathāgata is neither past, nor future, nor present. The suchness of all dharmas is also neither past, nor future, nor present. The suchness of the elder Subhūti is also like this. For this reason, it is said that the elder Subhūti is born together with the Tathāgata.

original: 「復次，過去真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故過去真如平等。
analyzed: 「復次，過去真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故過去真如平等。
translated: Furthermore, because the equality of the past suchness, the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata are all the equality of the suchness of the past.

original: 未來真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故未來真如平等。
analyzed: 未來真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故未來真如平等。
translated: Because the equality of the future suchness, the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata are all the equality of the suchness of the future.

original: 現在真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故現在真如平等。
analyzed: 現在真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故現在真如平等。
translated: Because the equality of the present suchness, the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata are all the equality of the suchness of the present.

original: 若過去未來現在真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 若過去未來現在真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: If the equality of the past, future, and present suchness, and the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata, are all the equality of suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，色真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故色真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，色真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故色真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the equality of the suchness of form, the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata are all the equality of the suchness of form;

original: 受、想、行、識真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故受、想、行、識真如平等。
analyzed: 受、想、行、識真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故受、想、行、識真如平等。
translated: because the equality of the suchness of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness, the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata are all the equality of the suchness of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: 如是若色真如平等，若受、想、行、識真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若色真如平等，若受、想、行、識真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In the same way, if the suchness of form is equal, if the suchness of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness is equal, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same in the equality of suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，眼處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼處真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，眼處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼處真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the eye-base is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the eye-base is equal.

original: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如平等。
analyzed: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如平等。
translated: Because the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind-bases is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind-bases is equal.

original: 如是若眼處真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若眼處真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the suchness of the eye-base is equal, if the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind-bases is equal, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same in the equality of suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，色處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故色處真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，色處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故色處真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the form-base is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the form-base is equal;

original: 聲、香、味、觸、法處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故聲、香、味、觸、法處真如平等。
analyzed: 聲、香、味、觸、法處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故聲、香、味、觸、法處真如平等。
translated: The suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms is equal, and therefore the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. The suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, and therefore the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms is equal.

original: 如是若色處真如平等，若聲、香、味、觸、法處真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若色處真如平等，若聲、香、味、觸、法處真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the suchness of the form realm is equal, and the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms is equal, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same suchness, equal, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，眼界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼界真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，眼界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼界真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the eye realm is equal, and therefore the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. The suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, and therefore the suchness of the eye realm is equal.

original: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意界真如平等。
analyzed: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意界真如平等。
translated: The suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms is equal, and therefore the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. The suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, and therefore the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind realms is equal.

original: 如是若眼界真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若眼界真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In the same way, if the suchness of the eye element is the same as the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind elements, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, they are the same suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，色界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故色界真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，色界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故色界真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the form element is the same, the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the suchness of the form element is the same.

original: 聲、香、味、觸、法界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故聲、香、味、觸、法界真如平等。
analyzed: 聲、香、味、觸、法界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故聲、香、味、觸、法界真如平等。
translated: Because the suchness of the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma elements is the same, the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the suchness of the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma elements is the same.

original: 如是若色界真如平等，若聲、香、味、觸、法界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若色界真如平等，若聲、香、味、觸、法界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the suchness of the form element is the same, and if the suchness of the sound, smell, taste, touch, and dharma elements is the same, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, they are the same suchness, without duality or distinction.🔽Here is the corrected and aligned text:

original: 「復次，眼識界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼識界真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，眼識界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼識界真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the eye-consciousness element is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the eye-consciousness element is equal.

original: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界真如平等。
analyzed: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界真如平等。
translated: Because the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness elements is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness elements is equal.

original: 如是若眼識界真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若眼識界真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, if the suchness of the eye-consciousness element is equal, if the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind consciousness elements is equal, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same suchness, equal, without duality, and undifferentiated.

original: 「復次，眼觸真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼觸真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，眼觸真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼觸真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of eye contact is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of eye contact is equal;

original: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸真如平等。
analyzed: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸真如平等。
translated: because the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contacts is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contacts is equal.

original: 如是若眼觸真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若眼觸真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the suchness of eye contact is equal, and if the suchness of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contacts is equal, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, it is the same suchness, equal and undifferentiated.

original: 「復次，眼觸為緣所生諸受真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼觸為緣所生諸受真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，眼觸為緣所生諸受真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故眼觸為緣所生諸受真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the feelings produced by eye contact as a condition is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the feelings produced by eye contact as a condition is equal;

original: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受真如平等。
analyzed: 耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受真如平等。
translated: because the suchness of the feelings produced by ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contacts as a condition is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the feelings produced by ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contacts as a condition is equal.

original: 如是若眼觸為緣所生諸受真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若眼觸為緣所生諸受真如平等，若耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In the same way, if the suchness of eye contact as a condition giving rise to various feelings is the same as the suchness of ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind contact as a condition giving rise to various feelings, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, then the suchness of all these is the same suchness, without duality or distinction.🔽Furthermore, because the suchness of the earth element is the same, the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same;

original: 「復次，地界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故地界真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，地界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故地界真如平等；
translated: because the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the suchness of the earth element is the same.

original: 水、火、風、空、識界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故水、火、風、空、識界真如平等。
analyzed: 水、火、風、空、識界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故水、火、風、空、識界真如平等。
translated: Because the suchness of the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements is the same, the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the suchness of the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements is the same.

original: 如是若地界真如平等，若水、火、風、空、識界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若地界真如平等，若水、火、風、空、識界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the suchness of the earth element is the same, and if the suchness of the water, fire, wind, space, and consciousness elements is the same, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, then the suchness of all these is the same suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，無明真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故無明真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，無明真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故無明真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of ignorance is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of ignorance is equal.

original: 行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故行乃至老死真如平等。
analyzed: 行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故行乃至老死真如平等。
translated: Because the suchness of formations, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of formations up to old age and death is equal.

original: 如是若無明真如平等，若行乃至老死真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若無明真如平等，若行乃至老死真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, if the suchness of ignorance is equal, if the suchness of formations up to old age and death is equal, if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same suchness, equal, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，布施波羅蜜多真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故布施波羅蜜多真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，布施波羅蜜多真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故布施波羅蜜多真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the perfection of generosity is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the perfection of generosity is equal;

original: 淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故淨戒乃至般若波羅蜜多真如平等。
analyzed: 淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故淨戒乃至般若波羅蜜多真如平等。
translated: The suchness of the perfections of morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the perfections of morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom.

original: 如是若布施波羅蜜多真如平等，若淨戒乃至般若波羅蜜多真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若布施波羅蜜多真如平等，若淨戒乃至般若波羅蜜多真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, the suchness of the perfection of generosity, the suchness of the perfections of morality up to wisdom, and the suchness of the Tathāgata are the same suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，內空真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故內空真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，內空真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故內空真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of internal emptiness is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of internal emptiness;

original: 外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故外空乃至無性自性空真如平等。
analyzed: 外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故外空乃至無性自性空真如平等。
translated: The suchness of external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, conditioned emptiness, unconditioned emptiness, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of transformation, inherent emptiness, specific emptiness, common emptiness, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-attainment, emptiness of nature, emptiness of self-nature, and emptiness of the nature of non-existence of self-nature is equal, therefore the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. Because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of external emptiness up to the emptiness of the nature of non-existence of self-nature is equal.

original: 如是若內空真如平等，若外空乃至無性自性空真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若內空真如平等，若外空乃至無性自性空真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, if the suchness of internal emptiness is equal, if the suchness of external emptiness up to the emptiness of the nature of non-existence of self-nature is equal, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same suchness, equal, without duality, and without distinction.

original: 「復次，真如真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故真如真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，真如真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故真如真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of suchness is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. Because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of suchness is equal;

original: 法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故法界乃至不思議界真如平等。
analyzed: 法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故法界乃至不思議界真如平等。
translated: The suchness of the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, non-changing nature, equality nature, separation from birth nature, dharma determination, dharma abode, ultimate reality, space realm, and inconceivable realm is equal. The suchness of the Tathāgata is equal because of this equality. The suchness of the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm is equal because of the equality of the suchness of the Tathāgata.

original: 如是若真如真如平等，若法界乃至不思議界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若真如真如平等，若法界乃至不思議界真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, if the suchness of suchness is equal, if the suchness of the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm is equal, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same suchness, equal, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，四念住真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四念住真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，四念住真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四念住真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the four establishments of mindfulness is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the four establishments of mindfulness is equal;

original: 四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四正斷乃至八聖道支真如平等。
analyzed: 四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四正斷乃至八聖道支真如平等。
translated: The suchness of the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, and eightfold noble path is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path.

original: 如是若四念住真如平等，若四正斷乃至八聖道支真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若四念住真如平等，若四正斷乃至八聖道支真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, if the suchness of the four establishments of mindfulness is the same, and the suchness of the four right efforts, up to the eightfold noble path is the same, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, it is the same suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，苦聖諦真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故苦聖諦真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，苦聖諦真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故苦聖諦真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the noble truth of suffering is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the noble truth of suffering;

original: 集、滅、道聖諦真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故集、滅、道聖諦真如平等。
analyzed: 集、滅、道聖諦真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故集、滅、道聖諦真如平等。
translated: The suchness of the noble truths of the accumulation, cessation, and path is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the noble truths of the accumulation, cessation, and path.

original: 如是若苦聖諦真如平等，若集、滅、道聖諦真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若苦聖諦真如平等，若集、滅、道聖諦真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In the same way, if the suchness of the noble truth of suffering is the same as the suchness of the noble truths of the origin, cessation, and path, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, it is a single suchness, the same without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，四靜慮真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四靜慮真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，四靜慮真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四靜慮真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the four meditations is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the four meditations;

original: 四無量、四無色定真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四無量、四無色定真如平等。
analyzed: 四無量、四無色定真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四無量、四無色定真如平等。
translated: the suchness of the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations.

original: 如是若四靜慮真如平等，若四無量、四無色定真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若四靜慮真如平等，若四無量、四無色定真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the suchness of the four meditations is the same, and if the suchness of the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations is the same, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, it is a single suchness, the same without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，八解脫真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故八解脫真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，八解脫真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故八解脫真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the eight liberations is the same as the suchness of the Tathāgata, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same as the suchness of the eight liberations;

original: 八勝處、九次第定、十遍處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故八勝處、九次第定、十遍處真如平等。
analyzed: 八勝處、九次第定、十遍處真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故八勝處、九次第定、十遍處真如平等。
translated: The suchness of the eight liberations, the eight spheres of mastery, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases is equal, and therefore the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. The suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, and therefore the suchness of the eight liberations, the eight spheres of mastery, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases is equal.

original: 如是若八解脫真如平等，若八勝處、九次第定、十遍處真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若八解脫真如平等，若八勝處、九次第定、十遍處真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the suchness of the eight liberations is equal, and the suchness of the eight spheres of mastery, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases is equal, and the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same in suchness, equal, without duality, and undifferentiated.

original: 「復次，空解脫門真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故空解脫門真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，空解脫門真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故空解脫門真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, the suchness of the liberation gate of emptiness is equal, and therefore the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. The suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, and therefore the suchness of the liberation gate of emptiness is equal;

original: 無相、無願解脫門真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故無相、無願解脫門真如平等。
analyzed: 無相、無願解脫門真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故無相、無願解脫門真如平等。
translated: The suchness of the liberation gates of signlessness and wishlessness is equal, and therefore the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. The suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, and therefore the suchness of the liberation gates of signlessness and wishlessness is equal.

original: 如是若空解脫門真如平等，若無相、無願解脫門真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若空解脫門真如平等，若無相、無願解脫門真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In the same way, if the suchness of the gate of emptiness is the same as the suchness of the gate of signlessness and the gate of wishlessness, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, they are the same suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，五眼真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故五眼真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，五眼真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故五眼真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the five eyes is the same, the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the suchness of the five eyes is the same.

original: 六神通真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故六神通真如平等。
analyzed: 六神通真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故六神通真如平等。
translated: Because the suchness of the six supernormal knowledges is the same, the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the suchness of the six supernormal knowledges is the same.

original: 如是若五眼真如平等，若六神通真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若五眼真如平等，若六神通真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the suchness of the five eyes is the same, if the suchness of the six supernormal knowledges is the same, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, they are the same suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，三摩地門真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故三摩地門真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，三摩地門真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故三摩地門真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of the meditative absorptions is the same, the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same; because the suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the suchness of the meditative absorptions is the same;

original: 陀羅尼門真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故陀羅尼門真如平等。
analyzed: 陀羅尼門真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故陀羅尼門真如平等。
translated: The equality of the true nature of the dhāraṇī gateways is the equality of the Tathāgata's true nature, and the equality of the Tathāgata's true nature is the equality of the true nature of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: 如是若三摩地門真如平等，若陀羅尼門真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若三摩地門真如平等，若陀羅尼門真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, the equality of the true nature of the samādhi gateways, the equality of the true nature of the dhāraṇī gateways, and the equality of the Tathāgata's true nature are the same true nature, equal and undifferentiated.

original: 「復次，佛十力真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故佛十力真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，佛十力真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故佛十力真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, the equality of the true nature of the Buddha's ten powers is the equality of the Tathāgata's true nature, and the equality of the Tathāgata's true nature is the equality of the true nature of the Buddha's ten powers;

original: 四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法真如平等。
analyzed: 四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法真如平等。
translated: the equality of the true nature of the four fearlessnesses, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities unique to a buddha is the equality of the Tathāgata's true nature, and the equality of the Tathāgata's true nature is the equality of the true nature of the four fearlessnesses up to the eighteen distinctive abilities unique to a buddha.

original: 如是若佛十力真如平等，若四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若佛十力真如平等，若四無所畏乃至十八佛不共法真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In the same way, if the true suchness of the ten powers of a buddha is the same as the true suchness of the four forms of fearlessness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha, and if the true suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, they are the same true suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，預流果真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故預流果真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，預流果真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故預流果真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the true suchness of the fruit of stream-entry is the same, the true suchness of the Tathāgata is the same; because the true suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the true suchness of the fruit of stream-entry is the same.

original: 一來、不還、阿羅漢果真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故一來、不還、阿羅漢果真如平等。
analyzed: 一來、不還、阿羅漢果真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故一來、不還、阿羅漢果真如平等。
translated: Because the true suchness of the fruits of the once-returner, non-returner, and arhat is the same, the true suchness of the Tathāgata is the same; because the true suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, the true suchness of the fruits of the once-returner, non-returner, and arhat is the same.

original: 如是若預流果真如平等，若一來、不還、阿羅漢果真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若預流果真如平等，若一來、不還、阿羅漢果真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: In this way, if the true suchness of the fruit of stream-entry is the same, and if the true suchness of the fruits of the once-returner, non-returner, and arhat is the same, and if the true suchness of the Tathāgata is the same, they are the same true suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，獨覺菩提真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故獨覺菩提真如平等。
analyzed: 「復次，獨覺菩提真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故獨覺菩提真如平等。
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of pratyekabuddha enlightenment is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. Because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of pratyekabuddha enlightenment is equal.

original: 如是若獨覺菩提真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若獨覺菩提真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, if the suchness of pratyekabuddha enlightenment is equal, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same in the equality of suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「復次，一切智真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故一切智真如平等；
analyzed: 「復次，一切智真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故一切智真如平等；
translated: Furthermore, because the suchness of omniscience is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. Because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of omniscience is equal;

original: 道相智、一切相智真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故道相智、一切相智真如平等。
analyzed: 道相智、一切相智真如平等故如來真如平等，如來真如平等故道相智、一切相智真如平等。
translated: because the suchness of the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects is equal, the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal. Because the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, the suchness of the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects is equal.

original: 如是若一切智真如平等，若道相智、一切相智真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
analyzed: 如是若一切智真如平等，若道相智、一切相智真如平等，若如來真如平等，同一真如平等無二無別。
translated: Thus, if the suchness of omniscience is equal, if the suchness of the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects is equal, and if the suchness of the Tathāgata is equal, they are the same in the equality of suchness, without duality or distinction.

original: 「諸天子！
analyzed: 「諸天子！
translated: Celestial sons!

original: 菩薩摩訶薩現證如是一切法真如平等故，說名如來、應、正等覺。
analyzed: 菩薩摩訶薩現證如是一切法真如平等故，說名如來、應、正等覺。
translated: Because bodhisattva-mahāsattvas directly realize the equality of the thusness of all dharmas, they are called Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Enlightened Ones.

original: 上座善現於此真如能深信解，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
analyzed: 上座善現於此真如能深信解，由此故說上座善現隨如來生。
translated: The elder Subhūti has profound faith and understanding in this thusness, and for this reason it is said that the elder Subhūti is born together with the Tathāgata.

original: 」大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百二十一三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯初分真如品第四十七之五正說如是真如相時，於此三千大千世界六種變動：
analyzed: 」大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百二十一三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯初分真如品第四十七之五正說如是真如相時，於此三千大千世界六種變動：
translated: When this characteristic of thusness was being taught, in this great trichiliocosm the earth moved in six ways:

original: 東踊西沒，西踊東沒，南踊北沒，北踊南沒，中踊邊沒邊踊中沒。
analyzed: 東踊西沒，西踊東沒，南踊北沒，北踊南沒，中踊邊沒邊踊中沒。
translated: shaking, shaking strongly, and shaking intensely; trembling, trembling strongly, and trembling intensely; quaking, quaking strongly, and quaking intensely.

original: 時，欲、色界諸天子，復以天上多揭羅香、多摩羅香、栴檀香末，及以天上嗢鉢羅華、鉢特摩華、拘某陀華、奔茶利華、美妙香華、美妙音華、大美妙音華，奉散世尊及善現上而白佛言：
analyzed: 時，欲、色界諸天子，復以天上多揭羅香、多摩羅香、栴檀香末，及以天上嗢鉢羅華、鉢特摩華、拘某陀華、奔茶利華、美妙香華、美妙音華、大美妙音華，奉散世尊及善現上而白佛言：
translated: At that time, the sons of heaven from the desire and form realms again took celestial tālī tree leaves, tamāla leaves, and sandalwood powder, as well as celestial utpala flowers, padma flowers, kumuda flowers, puṇḍarīka flowers, fragrant flowers, melodious flowers, and great melodious flowers, to scatter over the World-Honored One and Subhūti, and said to the Buddha,

original: 「甚奇！
analyzed: 「甚奇！
translated: How wondrous!

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 未曾有也！
analyzed: 未曾有也！
translated: It has never been seen before!

original: 上座善現由真如故，隨如來生。
analyzed: 上座善現由真如故，隨如來生。
translated: The elder Subhūti has been born following the Tathāgata due to suchness.

original: 」爾時，善現告欲、色界諸天子言：
analyzed: 」爾時，善現告欲、色界諸天子言：
translated: At that time, Subhūti said to the sons of heaven from the desire and form realms,

original: 「天子當知！
analyzed: 「天子當知！
translated: Sons of heaven, you should know!

original: 上座善現不由色故隨如來生，不由色真如故隨如來生，不離色故隨如來生，不離色真如故隨如來生；
analyzed: 上座善現不由色故隨如來生，不由色真如故隨如來生，不離色故隨如來生，不離色真如故隨如來生；
translated: The elder Subhūti has not been born following the Tathāgata due to form, nor has he been born following the Tathāgata due to the suchness of form; he has not been born following the Tathāgata apart from form, nor has he been born following the Tathāgata apart from the suchness of form;

original: 不由受、想、行、識故隨如來生，不由受、想、行、識真如故隨如來生，不離受、想、行、識故隨如來生，不離受、想、行、識真如故隨如來生。
analyzed: 不由受、想、行、識故隨如來生，不由受、想、行、識真如故隨如來生，不離受、想、行、識故隨如來生，不離受、想、行、識真如故隨如來生。
translated: It is not because of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness that one follows the Tathāgata's birth, not because of the suchness of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness that one follows the Tathāgata's birth, not apart from feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness that one follows the Tathāgata's birth, not apart from the suchness of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness that one follows the Tathāgata's birth.

original: 「天子當知！
analyzed: 「天子當知！
translated: Son of Heaven, you should know!

original: 上座善現不由眼處故隨如來生，不由眼處真如故隨如來生，不離眼處故隨如來生，不離眼處真如故隨如來生；
analyzed: 上座善現不由眼處故隨如來生，不由眼處真如故隨如來生，不離眼處故隨如來生，不離眼處真如故隨如來生；
translated: The elder Subhūti does not follow the Tathāgata's birth because of the eye faculty, not because of the suchness of the eye faculty that he follows the Tathāgata's birth, not apart from the eye faculty that he follows the Tathāgata's birth, not apart from the suchness of the eye faculty that he follows the Tathāgata's birth;

original: 不由耳、鼻、舌、身、意處故隨如來生，不由耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如故隨如來生，不離耳、鼻、舌、身、意處故隨如來生，不離耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如故隨如來生。
analyzed: 不由耳、鼻、舌、身、意處故隨如來生，不由耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如故隨如來生，不離耳、鼻、舌、身、意處故隨如來生，不離耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如故隨如來生。
translated: He does not follow the Tathāgata's birth because of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind faculties, not because of the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind faculties that he follows the Tathāgata's birth, not apart from the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind faculties that he follows the Tathāgata's birth, not apart from the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind faculties that he follows the Tathāgata's birth.

original: 「天子當知！
analyzed: 「天子當知！
translated: Your Majesty should know!

original: 上座善現不由色處故隨如來生，不由色處真如故隨如來生，不離色處故隨如來生，不離色處真如故隨如來生；
analyzed: 上座善現不由色處故隨如來生，不由色處真如故隨如來生，不離色處故隨如來生，不離色處真如故隨如來生；
translated: The elder Subhūti does not follow the Tathāgata because of the eye sense-field, does not follow the Tathāgata because of the true nature of the eye sense-field, does not follow the Tathāgata by leaving behind the eye sense-field, does not follow the Tathāgata by leaving behind the true nature of the eye sense-field;

original: 不由聲、香、味、觸、法處故隨如來生，不由聲、香、味、觸、法處真如故隨如來生，不離聲、香、味、觸、法處故隨如來生，不離聲、香、味、觸、法處真如故隨如來生。

analyzed: 何以故？

analyzed: 此中行乃至老死尚不可得，況有行乃至老死真如可得！

analyzed: 此中布施波羅蜜多尚不可得，況有布施波羅蜜多真如可得！

analyzed: 此中淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多不可得，淨戒乃至般若波羅蜜多真如亦不可得。

analyzed: 何以故？

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！

original: 何以故？

analyzed: 此中內空尚不可得，況有內空真如可得！
translated: Here, internal emptiness itself cannot be attained, let alone the true nature of internal emptiness that can be attained!

original: 此中外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空不可得，外空乃至無性自性空真如亦不可得。
analyzed: 此中外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空不可得，外空乃至無性自性空真如亦不可得。
translated: Here, external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, empty emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, conditioned emptiness, unconditioned emptiness, absolute emptiness, limitless emptiness, dispersed emptiness, unchanging emptiness, inherent emptiness, specific emptiness, general emptiness, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-attainment, emptiness of nature, emptiness of self-nature, and emptiness of the nature of non-existence cannot be attained, and the true nature of external emptiness up to the emptiness of the nature of non-existence also cannot be attained.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？

analyzed: 此中外空乃至無性自性空尚不可得，況有外空乃至無性自性空真如可得！
translated: Here, external emptiness up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence cannot be attained, let alone the attainment of the true nature of external emptiness up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence!

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！

analyzed: 此中真如不可得，真如真如亦不可得。

analyzed: 此中法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界不可得，法界乃至不思議界真如亦不可得。
translated: Here, the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, separation from birth nature, dharma determination, dharma abiding, ultimate reality, space realm, and inconceivable realm cannot be attained, and the true nature of the dharma realm up to the inconceivable realm also cannot be attained.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？

analyzed: 此中法界乃至不思議界尚不可得，況有法界乃至不思議界真如可得！

translated: Here, the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path are unobtainable, and the true nature of the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path is also unobtainable.

analyzed: 此中四正斷乃至八聖道支尚不可得，況有四正斷乃至八聖道支真如可得！
translated: Here, the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path are unobtainable, let alone the true nature of the four right efforts up to the eightfold noble path that can be obtained!

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
