translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，於佛所說甚深法門，終不生於疑惑猶豫。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，於佛所說甚深法門，終不生於疑惑猶豫。
translated: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva is irreversible, they will never give rise to doubt or uncertainty regarding the profound teachings spoken by the Buddha.

original: 」時，具壽善現白佛言：
analyzed: 」時，具壽善現白佛言：
translated: At that time, Subhūti addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-honored One!

original: 何緣不退轉菩薩摩訶薩，於佛所說甚深法門，終不生於疑惑猶豫？
analyzed: 何緣不退轉菩薩摩訶薩，於佛所說甚深法門，終不生於疑惑猶豫？
translated: Why is it that irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattvas will never give rise to doubt or uncertainty regarding the profound teachings spoken by the Buddha?

original: 」佛言：
analyzed: 」佛言：
translated: The Buddha said:

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩都不見有法可疑惑猶豫，謂不見有色，亦不見有受、想、行、識，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩都不見有法可疑惑猶豫，謂不見有色，亦不見有受、想、行、識，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see any dharma that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty, that is, they do not see form, nor do they see feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within them;

original: 不見有眼處，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有眼處，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: they do not see the eye-base, nor do they see the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind-base, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within them;

original: 不見有色處，亦不見有聲、香、味、觸、法處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有色處，亦不見有聲、香、味、觸、法處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: they do not see the form-base, nor do they see the sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharma-base, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within them;

original: 不見有眼界，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有眼界，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the eye element, nor do they see the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind element, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有色界，亦不見有聲、香、味、觸、法界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有色界，亦不見有聲、香、味、觸、法界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the form element, nor do they see the sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharma element, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有眼識界，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有眼識界，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the eye consciousness element, nor do they see the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness element, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有眼觸，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有眼觸，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see eye contact, nor do they see ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind contact, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有眼觸為緣所生諸受，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有眼觸為緣所生諸受，亦不見有耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the feelings that arise from eye contact as a condition, nor do they see the feelings that arise from ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind contact as a condition, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有地界，亦不見有水、火、風、空、識界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有地界，亦不見有水、火、風、空、識界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the earth element, nor do they see the water, fire, wind, space, or consciousness element, that can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有無明，亦不見有行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有無明，亦不見有行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see ignorance, nor do they see volitional actions, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, old age and death, in which to give rise to doubt and uncertainty;

original: 不見有布施波羅蜜多，亦不見有淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有布施波羅蜜多，亦不見有淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the perfection of generosity, nor do they see the perfections of morality, patience, vigor, meditation, or wisdom, in which to give rise to doubt and uncertainty;

original: 不見有內空，亦不見有外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有內空，亦不見有外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see internal emptiness, nor do they see external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of general characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature of non-existence, or emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence, in which to give rise to doubt and uncertainty;

original: 不見有真如，亦不見有法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有真如，亦不見有法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see any suchness, nor do they see any dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality nature, birthless nature, dharma determination, dharma abode, reality limit, space realm, or inconceivable realm, that they can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有四念住，亦不見有四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有四念住，亦不見有四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see any four establishments of mindfulness, nor do they see any four right efforts, four bases of supernatural powers, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, or eightfold noble path, that they can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有苦聖諦，亦不見有集、滅、道聖諦，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有苦聖諦，亦不見有集、滅、道聖諦，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see any noble truth of suffering, nor do they see any noble truth of accumulation, cessation, or path, that they can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有四靜慮，亦不見有四無量、四無色定，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有四靜慮，亦不見有四無量、四無色定，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see any four concentrations, nor do they see any four immeasurables or four formless concentrations, that they can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有八解脫，亦不見有八勝處、九次第定、十遍處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有八解脫，亦不見有八勝處、九次第定、十遍處，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see any eight liberations, nor do they see any eight superior realms, nine successive concentrations, or ten universal bases, that they can give rise to doubt or uncertainty within;

original: 不見有五眼，亦不見有六神通，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有五眼，亦不見有六神通，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the five eyes, nor do they see the six supernormal knowledges, that they might give rise to doubt and uncertainty therein;

original: 不見有三摩地門，亦不見有陀羅尼門，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有三摩地門，亦不見有陀羅尼門，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the three doors of liberation, nor do they see the dhāraṇī gateways, that they might give rise to doubt and uncertainty therein;

original: 不見有佛十力，亦不見有四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有佛十力，亦不見有四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the ten powers of the Buddha, nor do they see the four fearlessnesses, four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha, that they might give rise to doubt and uncertainty therein;

original: 不見有預流果，亦不見有一來、不還、阿羅漢果，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有預流果，亦不見有一來、不還、阿羅漢果，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the fruit of entering the stream, nor do they see the fruit of the once-returner, the fruit of the non-returner, and the fruit of arhatship, that they might give rise to doubt and uncertainty therein;

original: 不見有獨覺菩提，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有獨覺菩提，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see the enlightenment of a pratyekabuddha, that they might give rise to doubt and uncertainty therein;

original: 不見有一切智，亦不見有道相智、一切相智，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有一切智，亦不見有道相智、一切相智，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see omniscience, nor do they see the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects, that they might give rise to doubt and uncertainty therein;

original: 不見有異生地，亦不見有聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
analyzed: 不見有異生地，亦不見有聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地，可於中生疑惑猶豫；
translated: They do not see any different stages, nor do they see any stage of hearers, solitary realizers, bodhisattvas, or tathāgatas, in which they can give rise to doubt or uncertainty;

original: 不見有阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，可於中生疑惑猶豫。
analyzed: 不見有阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，可於中生疑惑猶豫。
translated: they do not see any unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, in which they can give rise to doubt or uncertainty.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes such practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.🔽Here is the corrected and aligned text:

original: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百二十五三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯初分不退轉品第四十九之二「復次，善現！
analyzed: 大般若波羅蜜多經卷第三百二十五三藏法師玄奘奉　詔譯初分不退轉品第四十九之二「復次，善現！
translated: The Great Prajñāpāramitā Sūtra, Scroll 323, Tripiṭaka Master Xuanzang Respectfully Translated by Imperial Order, Chapter 49, Part 2 of the Section on Irreversibility, Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，成就柔潤可愛可樂身、語、意業，於諸有情心無罣礙。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，成就柔潤可愛可樂身、語、意業，於諸有情心無罣礙。
translated: If an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva accomplishes a body, speech, and mind that are smooth, delightful, and lovable, and has no obstructions in his mind towards sentient beings.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes such practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，恒常成就慈、悲、喜、捨等起相應身、語、意業。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，恒常成就慈、悲、喜、捨等起相應身、語、意業。
translated: If an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva always accomplishes the arising of the associated actions of body, speech, and mind such as loving-kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity,

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes such practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，決定不與五蓋共居，所謂貪欲、瞋恚、惛沈睡眠、掉舉惡作、疑蓋。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，決定不與五蓋共居，所謂貪欲、瞋恚、惛沈睡眠、掉舉惡作、疑蓋。
translated: If an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva definitely does not dwell with the five hindrances, namely greed, anger, sloth, restlessness, and doubt.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes such practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，一切隨眠皆已摧伏，一切結縛隨煩惱纏，皆永不起現不可得。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，一切隨眠皆已摧伏，一切結縛隨煩惱纏，皆永不起現不可得。
translated: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva in the stage of nonretrogression, all latent tendencies have already been subdued, all bonds, afflictions, and entanglements never arise again and cannot be found.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes these practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is a bodhisattva-mahāsattva who is irreversible.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，入出往來心不迷謬，恒時安住正念正知，進止威儀、行住坐臥、舉足下足亦復如是，諸所遊履必觀其地，安庠繫念直視而行，運動語言甞無卒暴。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，入出往來心不迷謬，恒時安住正念正知，進止威儀、行住坐臥、舉足下足亦復如是，諸所遊履必觀其地，安庠繫念直視而行，運動語言甞無卒暴。
translated: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva in the stage of nonretrogression, entering, exiting, going, and coming, the mind is not confused or deluded, always abiding in right mindfulness and right cognition, whether in dignified deportment, walking, standing, sitting, or lying down, raising or lowering the feet, and so forth, all places visited must be observed, walking with composure, focused attention, and straight gaze, movements and speech are never abrupt or violent.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes these practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is a bodhisattva-mahāsattva who is irreversible.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，諸所受用臥具衣服，皆常香潔無諸臭穢，亦無垢膩蟣虱等蟲，心樂清華身無疾病。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，諸所受用臥具衣服，皆常香潔無諸臭穢，亦無垢膩蟣虱等蟲，心樂清華身無疾病。
translated: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva in the stage of nonretrogression uses bedding and clothing, they are all always fragrant, clean, and free from foul odors, and also free from dirt, lice, and other insects, and their mind delights in purity and their body is free from illness.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes these practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is a bodhisattva-mahāsattva who is irreversible.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，身心清淨，非如常人身中恒為八萬戶蟲之所侵食。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，身心清淨，非如常人身中恒為八萬戶蟲之所侵食。
translated: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva in the stage of nonretrogression has a pure body and mind, unlike ordinary people whose bodies are always invaded and eaten by the eighty-four thousand kinds of worms.

original: 所以者何？
analyzed: 所以者何？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 是諸菩薩善根增上出過世間，所受身形內外清淨，故無蟲類侵食其身。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩善根增上出過世間，所受身形內外清淨，故無蟲類侵食其身。
translated: Because this bodhisattva's wholesome roots are superior and surpass the worldly, and the physical form they receive is pure inside and out, so there are no kinds of worms that invade and eat their body.

original: 如如善根漸漸增益，如是如是身心轉淨，由此因緣，是諸菩薩身心堅固猶若金剛，不為違緣之所侵惱。
analyzed: 如如善根漸漸增益，如是如是身心轉淨，由此因緣，是諸菩薩身心堅固猶若金剛，不為違緣之所侵惱。
translated: As the wholesome roots gradually increase, the body and mind become increasingly pure. For this reason, the body and mind of these bodhisattvas are firm and solid like vajra, and are not harmed by adverse conditions.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes these practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 」時，具壽善現白佛言：
analyzed: 」時，具壽善現白佛言：
translated: At that time, Subhūti addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩云何而得身心清淨？
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩云何而得身心清淨？
translated: How do these bodhisattva-mahāsattvas attain the purity of body and mind?

original: 」佛言：
analyzed: 」佛言：
translated: The Buddha said:

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩如如善根漸漸增長，如是如是身心諂曲，由善根力所除遣故，窮未來際畢竟不起，由此而得身心清淨。
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩如如善根漸漸增長，如是如是身心諂曲，由善根力所除遣故，窮未來際畢竟不起，由此而得身心清淨。
translated: As these bodhisattva-mahāsattvas' wholesome roots gradually increase, their body and mind become increasingly free from deceit and flattery. Because of the power of their wholesome roots, they are forever eliminated and will never arise again in the future. For this reason, they attain the purity of body and mind.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩如如善根漸漸增長，如是如是身、語、意業，由善根力所磨瑩故，遠離一切濁穢邪曲，由此而得身心清淨，身心淨故超過聲聞及獨覺地，住菩薩位堅固不動。
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩如如善根漸漸增長，如是如是身、語、意業，由善根力所磨瑩故，遠離一切濁穢邪曲，由此而得身心清淨，身心淨故超過聲聞及獨覺地，住菩薩位堅固不動。
translated: As the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's wholesome roots gradually increase, his physical, verbal, and mental actions, due to the power of the wholesome roots being polished, are far removed from all turbidity and crookedness. Because of this, he attains the purity of body and mind. Because of the purity of body and mind, he surpasses the stage of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and abides firmly and unmoved in the stage of bodhisattvas.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes these practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，不重利養，不侚名譽，於諸飲食、衣服、臥具、房舍、資財皆不貪染，雖受十二杜多功德，而於其中都無所恃。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，不重利養，不侚名譽，於諸飲食、衣服、臥具、房舍、資財皆不貪染，雖受十二杜多功德，而於其中都無所恃。
translated: If an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not value profit, does not pursue fame, and is not attached to food and drink, clothing, bedding, dwellings, and wealth, although he receives the twelve kinds of dhuta virtues, he does not rely on them at all.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes such practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that one is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，常修布施波羅蜜多，慳貪之心畢竟不起；
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，常修布施波羅蜜多，慳貪之心畢竟不起；
translated: If an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva always cultivates the perfection of generosity, a stingy mind will never arise;

original: 常修淨戒波羅蜜多，犯戒之心畢竟不起；
analyzed: 常修淨戒波羅蜜多，犯戒之心畢竟不起；
translated: always cultivates the perfection of morality, a mind to violate precepts will never arise;

original: 常修安忍波羅蜜多，忿恚之心畢竟不起；🔽常修精進波羅蜜多，懈怠之心畢竟不起；
analyzed: 常修安忍波羅蜜多，忿恚之心畢竟不起； 常修精進波羅蜜多，懈怠之心畢竟不起；
translated: always cultivates the perfection of patience, an angry mind will never arise;🔽always cultivates the perfection of vigor, a lazy mind will never arise;

original: 常修靜慮波羅蜜多，散亂之心畢竟不起；
analyzed: 常修靜慮波羅蜜多，散亂之心畢竟不起；
translated: always cultivates the perfection of meditation, a distracted mind will never arise;

original: 常修般若波羅蜜多，愚癡之心畢竟不起。
analyzed: 常修般若波羅蜜多，愚癡之心畢竟不起。
translated: always cultivates the perfection of wisdom, a deluded mind will never arise.

original: 由此嫉妬、諂誑、憍逸、覆惱等心亦永不起。
analyzed: 由此嫉妬、諂誑、憍逸、覆惱等心亦永不起。
translated: Because of this, jealous, deceitful, arrogant, and oppressive minds will also never arise.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes such practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，覺慧堅固能深悟入，聽聞正法恭敬信受，隨所聽聞世、出世法，皆能方便會入般若波羅蜜多甚深理趣，諸所造作世間事業，亦以般若波羅蜜多會入法性，不見一事出法性者，設有不與法性相應，亦能方便會入般若波羅蜜多甚深理趣，由此不見出法性者。
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，覺慧堅固能深悟入，聽聞正法恭敬信受，隨所聽聞世、出世法，皆能方便會入般若波羅蜜多甚深理趣，諸所造作世間事業，亦以般若波羅蜜多會入法性，不見一事出法性者，設有不與法性相應，亦能方便會入般若波羅蜜多甚深理趣，由此不見出法性者。
translated: If an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva has firm and profound understanding, listens to the true Dharma with respect and faith, and according to what he hears, whether worldly or supramundane dharmas, he is able to skillfully enter the profound principle of prajñā-pāramitā. All worldly activities he creates, he also uses prajñā-pāramitā to enter the nature of dharmas. He does not see a single thing that is outside the nature of dharmas. Even if there is something that is not in accord with the nature of dharmas, he is still able to skillfully enter the profound principle of prajñā-pāramitā. Because of this, he does not see anything outside the nature of dharmas.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes such practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，設有惡魔現前化作八大地獄，復於一一大地獄中，化作多百菩薩、多千菩薩、多百千菩薩、多俱胝菩薩、多百俱胝菩薩、多千俱胝菩薩、多百千俱胝菩薩、多百千俱胝那庾多菩薩，皆被猛焰交徹燒然，各受辛酸楚毒大苦，作是化已語不退轉諸菩薩言：
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，設有惡魔現前化作八大地獄，復於一一大地獄中，化作多百菩薩、多千菩薩、多百千菩薩、多俱胝菩薩、多百俱胝菩薩、多千俱胝菩薩、多百千俱胝菩薩、多百千俱胝那庾多菩薩，皆被猛焰交徹燒然，各受辛酸楚毒大苦，作是化已語不退轉諸菩薩言：
translated: If there are irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, even if a wicked māra were to manifest in front of them as the eight great hells, and were to transform many hundreds of bodhisattvas, many thousands of bodhisattvas, many hundreds of thousands of bodhisattvas, many koṭis of bodhisattvas, many hundreds of koṭis of bodhisattvas, many thousands of koṭis of bodhisattvas, many hundreds of thousands of koṭis of bodhisattvas, many hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of bodhisattvas in each of those great hells, all of them being burned by the intense flames, each experiencing the extremely painful and bitter suffering, and having made this transformation, were to say to those irreversible bodhisattvas:

original: 『此諸菩薩皆受如來、應、正等覺不退轉記，故生如是大地獄中恒受如斯種種劇苦，汝等菩薩既受如來、應、正等覺不退轉記，亦當墮此大地獄中受諸劇苦。
analyzed: 『此諸菩薩皆受如來、應、正等覺不退轉記，故生如是大地獄中恒受如斯種種劇苦，汝等菩薩既受如來、應、正等覺不退轉記，亦當墮此大地獄中受諸劇苦。
translated: 'These bodhisattvas have all received the prophecy of irreversibility from the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, and therefore they have been born in these great hells and are constantly experiencing this kind of intense suffering. You bodhisattvas, having received the prophecy of irreversibility from the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, will also fall into these great hells and experience intense suffering.

original: 佛授汝等大地獄中受極苦記，非授無上正等菩提不退轉記，是故汝等應速棄捨大菩提心，可得免脫大地獄苦，生於天上或生人中受諸富樂。
analyzed: 佛授汝等大地獄中受極苦記，非授無上正等菩提不退轉記，是故汝等應速棄捨大菩提心，可得免脫大地獄苦，生於天上或生人中受諸富樂。
translated: The Buddha has given you the prediction of experiencing extreme suffering in the great hells, not the prediction of irreversibility from unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. Therefore, you should quickly abandon the mind of great enlightenment, and you may escape the suffering of the great hells and be reborn in the heavens or among humans to experience various kinds of wealth and happiness.'

original: 』「善現！
analyzed: 』「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 爾時，不退轉菩薩摩訶薩見聞此事，其心不動亦不驚疑，但作是念：
analyzed: 爾時，不退轉菩薩摩訶薩見聞此事，其心不動亦不驚疑，但作是念：
translated: At that time, the irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, upon seeing and hearing this matter, their minds were unmoved and they were not surprised or doubtful. They only thought:

original: 『受不退轉記菩薩摩訶薩，若墮地獄、傍生、鬼界、阿素洛中終無是處。
analyzed: 『受不退轉記菩薩摩訶薩，若墮地獄、傍生、鬼界、阿素洛中終無是處。
translated: 'For the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas who have received the prediction of irreversibility, it is impossible that they will fall into the hells, the realm of animals, the realm of hungry ghosts, or the asura realm.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 不退轉位菩薩，定無不善業故，亦無善業招苦果故，如來必無虛誑語故，諸佛所說皆為利樂一切有情，大慈悲心所流出故，所見聞者定是惡魔所作所說。
analyzed: 不退轉位菩薩，定無不善業故，亦無善業招苦果故，如來必無虛誑語故，諸佛所說皆為利樂一切有情，大慈悲心所流出故，所見聞者定是惡魔所作所說。
translated: Because the bodhisattvas in the stage of nonretrogression definitely do not have unwholesome karma, and also do not have wholesome karma that attracts suffering as a result, and because the Tathāgata definitely has no false or deceptive speech, and because what is spoken by all Buddhas is all for the benefit and happiness of all sentient beings, flowing out from the mind of great kindness and compassion. Therefore, what is seen and heard is definitely the work and speech of the evil māras.

original: 』善現！
analyzed: 』善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes such practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is a nonretrogressive bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，設有惡魔作沙門像，來至其所唱如是言：
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，設有惡魔作沙門像，來至其所唱如是言：
translated: If a nonretrogressive bodhisattva-mahāsattva, even if an evil māra assumes the appearance of a śramaṇa and comes to them, proclaiming such words:

original: 『汝先所聞應修布施波羅蜜多究竟圓滿，應修淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多究竟圓滿，當證無上正等菩提，如是所聞皆為邪說應疾棄捨。
analyzed: 『汝先所聞應修布施波羅蜜多究竟圓滿，應修淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多究竟圓滿，當證無上正等菩提，如是所聞皆為邪說應疾棄捨。
translated: 'What you have previously heard about perfecting the perfection of giving, perfecting the perfections of morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom, and attaining supreme perfect enlightenment, is all false and should be quickly abandoned.

original: 又汝先聞應於過去未來現在一切如來、應、正等覺及諸弟子，從初發心乃至法住，其中所有功德善根，皆生隨喜一切合集，與諸有情迴向無上正等菩提，如是所聞亦為邪說應疾棄捨。
analyzed: 又汝先聞應於過去未來現在一切如來、應、正等覺及諸弟子，從初發心乃至法住，其中所有功德善根，皆生隨喜一切合集，與諸有情迴向無上正等菩提，如是所聞亦為邪說應疾棄捨。
translated: Moreover, what you have previously heard about rejoicing in all the merit and virtue of all past, future, and present Tathagatas, Arhats, Samyak-sambuddhas and their disciples, from their initial generation of the mind of enlightenment up to the abiding of the Dharma, and dedicating it all together to supreme perfect enlightenment for all beings, is also false and should be quickly abandoned.

original: 若汝棄捨所聞邪法，我當教汝真實佛法，令汝修學速證無上正等菩提。
analyzed: 若汝棄捨所聞邪法，我當教汝真實佛法，令汝修學速證無上正等菩提。
translated: If you abandon what you have heard of false Dharma, I will teach you the true Buddha Dharma, enabling you to quickly attain supreme perfect enlightenment through practice and study.'

original: 汝先所聞非真佛語，是文頌者虛妄撰集，我之所說是真佛語。
analyzed: 汝先所聞非真佛語，是文頌者虛妄撰集，我之所說是真佛語。
translated: What you have heard before is not the true word of the Buddha, but the false compilation of poets. What I say now is the true word of the Buddha.

original: 』善現！
analyzed: 』善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩聞如是語心動驚疑，當知未得諸佛為授不退轉記，彼於無上正等菩提猶未決定。
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩聞如是語心動驚疑，當知未得諸佛為授不退轉記，彼於無上正等菩提猶未決定。
translated: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva hears such words and their mind moves, is startled, or doubts, you should know that they have not yet attained the nonretrogressive prediction from the buddhas, and they are still not determined in supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩聞如是語，其心不動亦不驚疑，但隨無作、無相、無生法性而住。
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩聞如是語，其心不動亦不驚疑，但隨無作、無相、無生法性而住。
translated: If a bodhisattva-mahāsattva hears such words, their mind does not move, is not startled or doubtful, but abides in accordance with the nature of non-action, signlessness, and non-arising.

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩諸有所作不信他語，不隨他教而修布施波羅蜜多，不隨他教而修淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩諸有所作不信他語，不隨他教而修布施波羅蜜多，不隨他教而修淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva, in all their activities, does not believe the words of others, does not follow the teachings of others in cultivating the perfection of generosity, and does not follow the teachings of others in cultivating morality, patience, vigor, meditation, and wisdom.

original: 不隨他教而住內空，不隨他教而住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；
analyzed: 不隨他教而住內空，不隨他教而住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；
translated: They do not abide in inner emptiness following the teachings of others, nor do they abide in outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of non-abandonment, emptiness of inherent nature, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of essential nature of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而住真如，不隨他教而住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
analyzed: 不隨他教而住真如，不隨他教而住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
translated: They do not abide in suchness following the teachings of others, nor do they abide in the dharma realm, the dharma nature, the unmistaken nature, the immutable nature, the true nature, the inborn nature, the dharma disposition, the dharma stage, the ultimate reality, the space element, and the inconceivable element following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修四念住，不隨他教而修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修四念住，不隨他教而修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
translated: They do not cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the four right efforts, the four bases of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of awakening, and the eightfold noble path following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而住苦聖諦，不隨他教而住集、滅、道聖諦；
analyzed: 不隨他教而住苦聖諦，不隨他教而住集、滅、道聖諦；
translated: They do not abide in the noble truth of suffering by following the teachings of others, nor do they abide in the noble truths of the accumulation, cessation, and path of suffering by following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修四靜慮，不隨他教而修四無量、四無色定；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修四靜慮，不隨他教而修四無量、四無色定；
translated: They do not cultivate the four concentrations by following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the four immeasurables and four formless concentrations by following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修八解脫，不隨他教而修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修八解脫，不隨他教而修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
translated: They do not cultivate the eight liberations by following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the eight superior realms, nine successive concentrations, and ten universal bases by following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修空解脫門，不隨他教而修無相、無願解脫門；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修空解脫門，不隨他教而修無相、無願解脫門；
translated: They do not cultivate the emptiness liberation gate by following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the signless and wishless liberation gates by following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修極喜地，不隨他教而修離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修極喜地，不隨他教而修離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地；
translated: They do not cultivate the ground of extreme joy by following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the ground of stainlessness, the luminous ground, the ground of wisdom blaze, the extremely difficult to conquer ground, the face-to-face ground, the ground of far-reaching, the immovable ground, the ground of excellent wisdom, or the cloud of Dharma ground by following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修五眼，不隨他教而修六神通；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修五眼，不隨他教而修六神通；
translated: They do not cultivate the five eyes by following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the six supernormal knowledges by following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修三摩地門，不隨他教而修陀羅尼門；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修三摩地門，不隨他教而修陀羅尼門；
translated: They do not cultivate the door of samādhi following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the door of dhāraṇī following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修佛十力，不隨他教而修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修佛十力，不隨他教而修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
translated: They do not cultivate the ten powers of the Buddha following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the four forms of fearlessness, the four forms of unobstructed understanding, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修順逆觀十二支緣起；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修順逆觀十二支緣起；
translated: They do not cultivate the forward and reverse observation of the twelve links of dependent arising following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而知苦、斷集、證滅、修道；
analyzed: 不隨他教而知苦、斷集、證滅、修道；
translated: They do not know suffering, cut off the accumulation [of suffering], realize cessation, or cultivate the path following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而起證預流果智，不隨他教而起證一來、不還、阿羅漢果智；
analyzed: 不隨他教而起證預流果智，不隨他教而起證一來、不還、阿羅漢果智；
translated: They do not give rise to the cognition of realizing and attaining the fruit of stream-entry following the teachings of others, nor do they give rise to the cognition of realizing and attaining the fruits of once-returning, non-returning, and arhatship following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而起證獨覺菩提智；
analyzed: 不隨他教而起證獨覺菩提智；
translated: They do not give rise to the cognition of realizing and attaining the enlightenment of a pratyekabuddha;

original: 不隨他教而起入菩薩正性離生位智；
analyzed: 不隨他教而起入菩薩正性離生位智；
translated: They do not give rise to the cognition of entering the stage of right and perfect awakening of a bodhisattva following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而嚴淨佛土，不隨他教而成熟有情；
analyzed: 不隨他教而嚴淨佛土，不隨他教而成熟有情；
translated: They do not adorn and purify buddha-lands following the teachings of others, nor do they bring sentient beings to maturity following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而起菩薩神通；
analyzed: 不隨他教而起菩薩神通；
translated: They do not give rise to the supernormal powers of a bodhisattva;

original: 不隨他教而修一切智，不隨他教而修道相智、一切相智；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修一切智，不隨他教而修道相智、一切相智；
translated: They do not cultivate omniscience following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而斷一切煩惱相續習氣；
analyzed: 不隨他教而斷一切煩惱相續習氣；
translated: they do not sever the continuity of all afflictions and habitual tendencies following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而修無忘失法，不隨他教而修恒住捨性；
analyzed: 不隨他教而修無忘失法，不隨他教而修恒住捨性；
translated: they do not cultivate the Dharma of non-forgetfulness following the teachings of others, nor do they cultivate the nature of constant abandonment following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而自攝受圓滿壽量；
analyzed: 不隨他教而自攝受圓滿壽量；
translated: they do not autonomously perfect their lifespan following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而轉法輪；
analyzed: 不隨他教而轉法輪；
translated: they do not turn the wheel of the Dharma following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而護正法；
analyzed: 不隨他教而護正法；
translated: they do not protect the true Dharma following the teachings of others;

original: 不隨他教而趣無上正等菩提。
analyzed: 不隨他教而趣無上正等菩提。
translated: they do not proceed to unsurpassed perfect enlightenment following the teachings of others.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 如漏盡阿羅漢諸有所作不信他語，現證法性無惑無疑，一切惡魔不能傾動。
analyzed: 如漏盡阿羅漢諸有所作不信他語，現證法性無惑無疑，一切惡魔不能傾動。
translated: Just as arhats who have exhausted the contaminants do not believe the words of others in all their actions, but directly realize the nature of dharmas without doubt or confusion, and cannot be swayed by any evil māras.

original: 如是不退轉菩薩摩訶薩，一切聲聞、獨覺、外道、諸惡魔等，不能破壞折伏其心，令於無上正等菩提而生退屈。
analyzed: 如是不退轉菩薩摩訶薩，一切聲聞、獨覺、外道、諸惡魔等，不能破壞折伏其心，令於無上正等菩提而生退屈。
translated: In the same way, the irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva cannot be destroyed or defeated in their mind by all the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, non-Buddhists, and evil māras, causing them to regress from supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩決定已住不退轉地，所有事業皆自思惟，非但信他而便起作，乃至如來、應、正等覺所有言教尚不信行，況信聲聞、獨覺、外道、惡魔等語而有所作。
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩決定已住不退轉地，所有事業皆自思惟，非但信他而便起作，乃至如來、應、正等覺所有言教尚不信行，況信聲聞、獨覺、外道、惡魔等語而有所作。
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva is definitely abiding in the irreversible stage. All their activities are self-contemplated, not just trusting others and then acting. Even the teachings of the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One are not trusted and practiced, let alone trusting the words of śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, non-Buddhists, and evil māras and doing anything.

original: 是諸菩薩諸有所為，但信他行終無是處。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩諸有所為，但信他行終無是處。
translated: For these bodhisattvas, there is never a case of doing anything by only trusting others.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 善現！
analyzed: 善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見有法可信行者。
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見有法可信行者。
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see any dharma that can be trusted and practiced.

original: 所以者何？
analyzed: 所以者何？
translated: Why is this?

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見色，不見受、想、行、識可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見色，不見受、想、行、識可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see form, feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見色真如，不見受、想、行、識真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見色真如，不見受、想、行、識真如可信行者。
translated: he also does not see the suchness of form, feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼處，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意處可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼處，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意處可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見眼處真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見眼處真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意處真如可信行者。
translated: he also does not see the suchness of the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見色處，不見聲、香、味、觸、法處可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見色處，不見聲、香、味、觸、法處可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see form, sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見色處真如，不見聲、香、味、觸、法處真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見色處真如，不見聲、香、味、觸、法處真如可信行者。
translated: he also does not see the suchness of form, sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼界，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意界可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼界，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意界可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the eye element, does not see the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind element that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見眼界真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意界真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見眼界真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意界真如可信行者。
translated: he also does not see the suchness of the eye element, does not see the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind element that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見色界，不見聲、香、味、觸、法界可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見色界，不見聲、香、味、觸、法界可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the form element, does not see the sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas element that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見色界真如，不見聲、香、味、觸、法界真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見色界真如，不見聲、香、味、觸、法界真如可信行者。
translated: he also does not see the suchness of the form element, does not see the suchness of the sound, smell, taste, touch, or dharmas element that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼識界，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼識界，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the eye consciousness element, does not see the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness element that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見眼識界真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見眼識界真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意識界真如可信行者。
translated: he also does not see the suchness of the eye consciousness element, does not see the suchness of the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousness element that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼觸，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼觸，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see eye contact, does not see ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind contact that can be practiced with trust;

original: 亦不見眼觸真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見眼觸真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸真如可信行者。
translated: he also does not see the suchness of eye contact, does not see the suchness of ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind contact that can be practiced with trust.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼觸為緣所生諸受，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見眼觸為緣所生諸受，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the various feelings arisen from eye contact as a condition, does not see the various feelings arisen from ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind contact as a condition that can be practiced with trust;

original: 亦不見眼觸為緣所生諸受真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見眼觸為緣所生諸受真如，不見耳、鼻、舌、身、意觸為緣所生諸受真如可信行者。
translated: he also does not see the suchness of the various feelings arisen from eye contact as a condition, does not see the suchness of the various feelings arisen from ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind contact as a condition that can be practiced with trust.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見地界，不見水、火、風、空、識界可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見地界，不見水、火、風、空、識界可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the earth element, does not see the water, fire, wind, space, or consciousness elements that can be practiced with trust;

original: 亦不見地界真如，不見水、火、風、空、識界真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見地界真如，不見水、火、風、空、識界真如可信行者。
translated: They also do not see the suchness of the earth element, nor do they see the suchness of the water, fire, wind, space, or consciousness elements that a practitioner should have faith in.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見無明，不見行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見無明，不見行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see ignorance, nor does he see the formations, consciousness, name-and-form, six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, or old age and death that a practitioner should have faith in;

original: 亦不見無明真如，不見行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見無明真如，不見行、識、名色、六處、觸、受、愛、取、有、生、老死真如可信行者。
translated: He also does not see the suchness of ignorance, nor does he see the suchness of the formations, consciousness, name-and-form, six sense bases, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, old age and death that a practitioner should have faith in.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見布施波羅蜜多，不見淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見布施波羅蜜多，不見淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the perfection of giving, nor does he see the perfection of morality, patience, vigor, concentration, or wisdom that a practitioner should have faith in;

original: 亦不見布施波羅蜜多真如，不見淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見布施波羅蜜多真如，不見淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多真如可信行者。
translated: They do not see the suchness of the perfection of giving, nor do they see the suchness of morality, patience, vigor, meditation, or wisdom that a practitioner of faith should see.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見內空，不見外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見內空，不見外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see internal emptiness, nor does he see external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of general characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature of non-existence, or emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence that a practitioner of faith should see;

original: 亦不見內空真如，不見外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見內空真如，不見外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空真如可信行者。
translated: They do not see the suchness of internal emptiness, nor do they see the suchness of external emptiness, internal and external emptiness, empty emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, conditioned emptiness, unconditioned emptiness, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, dispersed emptiness, emptiness of unchanging transformation, emptiness of inherent nature, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of common characteristics, emptiness of all dharmas, emptiness of non-attainment, emptiness of nature, emptiness of self-nature, or the suchness of the emptiness of the nature of self-nature that can be trusted by practitioners.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見真如，不見法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見真如，不見法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see suchness, nor does he see the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, non-changing nature, equality nature, nature of detachment from birth, dharma determination, dharma abode, reality limit, space realm, or inconceivable realm that can be trusted by practitioners;

original: 亦不見真如真如，不見法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見真如真如，不見法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界真如可信行者。
translated: They do not see the suchness of suchness, and do not see the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, non-changing nature, equality nature, separation nature, dharma determination, dharma abode, reality limit, space realm, inconceivable realm, or the suchness of suchness that can be trusted by practitioners.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見四念住，不見四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見四念住，不見四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the four establishments of mindfulness, and does not see the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, or eightfold noble path that can be trusted by practitioners;

original: 亦不見四念住真如，不見四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見四念住真如，不見四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支真如可信行者。
translated: They also do not see the suchness of the four establishments of mindfulness, and do not see the suchness of the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, or eightfold noble path that can be trusted by practitioners.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見苦聖諦，不見集、滅、道聖諦可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見苦聖諦，不見集、滅、道聖諦可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the noble truth of suffering, and does not see the noble truths of the arising, cessation, or path of suffering that can be trusted by practitioners;

original: 亦不見苦聖諦真如，不見集、滅、道聖諦真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見苦聖諦真如，不見集、滅、道聖諦真如可信行者。
translated: They do not see the true suchness of the noble truth of suffering, nor do they see the true suchness of the noble truths of the accumulation, cessation, and path that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見四靜慮，不見四無量、四無色定可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見四靜慮，不見四無量、四無色定可信行者；
translated: These bodhisattva-mahāsattvas do not see the four meditations, nor do they see the four immeasurable [minds] and four formless concentrations that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見四靜慮真如，不見四無量、四無色定真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見四靜慮真如，不見四無量、四無色定真如可信行者。
translated: They also do not see the true suchness of the four meditations, nor do they see the true suchness of the four immeasurable [minds] and four formless concentrations that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見八解脫，不見八勝處、九次第定、十遍處可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見八解脫，不見八勝處、九次第定、十遍處可信行者；
translated: These bodhisattva-mahāsattvas do not see the eight liberations, nor do they see the eight superior [meditations], nine sequential [meditations], and ten universal bases that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見八解脫真如，不見八勝處、九次第定、十遍處真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見八解脫真如，不見八勝處、九次第定、十遍處真如可信行者。
translated: They also do not see the true suchness of the eight liberations, nor do they see the true suchness of the eight superior [meditations], nine sequential [meditations], and ten universal bases that can be practiced with faith.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見空解脫門，不見無相、無願解脫門可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見空解脫門，不見無相、無願解脫門可信行者；
translated: These bodhisattva-mahāsattvas do not see the door of liberation of emptiness, nor do they see the door of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness that can be practiced with faith;

original: 亦不見空解脫門真如，不見無相、無願解脫門真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見空解脫門真如，不見無相、無願解脫門真如可信行者。
translated: They do not see the true nature of the gate of emptiness, liberation, and the gate of signlessness, wishlessness, liberation as something to be trusted in by a practitioner.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見五眼，不見六神通可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見五眼，不見六神通可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the five eyes, does not see the six supernormal knowledges as something to be trusted in by a practitioner;

original: 亦不見五眼真如，不見六神通真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見五眼真如，不見六神通真如可信行者。
translated: They also do not see the true nature of the five eyes, do not see the true nature of the six supernormal knowledges as something to be trusted in by a practitioner.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見三摩地門，不見陀羅尼門可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見三摩地門，不見陀羅尼門可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the dhāraṇī gateways, does not see the samādhi gateways as something to be trusted in by a practitioner;

original: 亦不見三摩地門真如，不見陀羅尼門真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見三摩地門真如，不見陀羅尼門真如可信行者。
translated: They also do not see the true nature of the dhāraṇī gateways, do not see the true nature of the samādhi gateways as something to be trusted in by a practitioner.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見佛十力，不見四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見佛十力，不見四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the ten powers of the Buddha, does not see the four fearlessnesses, four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha as something to be trusted in by a practitioner;

original: 亦不見佛十力真如，不見四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見佛十力真如，不見四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法真如可信行者。
translated: They do not see the true suchness of the Buddha's ten powers, and they do not see the true suchness of the four fearlessnesses, four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, or the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha that can be trusted by practitioners.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見預流果，不見一來、不還、阿羅漢果可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見預流果，不見一來、不還、阿羅漢果可信行者；
translated: These bodhisattva-mahāsattvas do not see the fruit of stream-entry, and they do not see the fruit of once-returning, non-returning, or arhatship that can be trusted by practitioners;

original: 亦不見預流果真如，不見一來、不還、阿羅漢果真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見預流果真如，不見一來、不還、阿羅漢果真如可信行者。
translated: they also do not see the true suchness of the fruit of stream-entry, and they do not see the true suchness of the fruit of once-returning, non-returning, or arhatship that can be trusted by practitioners.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見獨覺菩提可信行者，亦不見獨覺菩提真如可信行者。
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見獨覺菩提可信行者，亦不見獨覺菩提真如可信行者。
translated: These bodhisattva-mahāsattvas do not see the enlightenment of a pratyekabuddha that can be trusted by practitioners, and they also do not see the true suchness of the enlightenment of a pratyekabuddha that can be trusted by practitioners.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見一切智，不見道相智、一切相智可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見一切智，不見道相智、一切相智可信行者；
translated: These bodhisattva-mahāsattvas do not see omniscience, and they do not see the cognition of the path, or the cognition of all aspects that can be trusted by practitioners;

original: 亦不見一切智真如，不見道相智、一切相智真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見一切智真如，不見道相智、一切相智真如可信行者。
translated: They do not see the suchness of omniscience, nor do they see the suchness of the cognition of the path and the cognition of all aspects that can be trusted.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見異生地，不見聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地可信行者；
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見異生地，不見聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地可信行者；
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the stage of different kinds, nor does he see the stage of śrāvakas, the stage of pratyekabuddhas, the stage of bodhisattvas, or the stage of tathāgatas that can be trusted.

original: 亦不見異生地真如，不見聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地真如可信行者。
analyzed: 亦不見異生地真如，不見聲聞地、獨覺地、菩薩地、如來地真如可信行者。
translated: He also does not see the suchness of the stage of different kinds, nor does he see the suchness of the stage of śrāvakas, the stage of pratyekabuddhas, the stage of bodhisattvas, or the stage of tathāgatas that can be trusted.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見諸佛無上正等菩提可信行者，亦不見諸佛無上正等菩提真如可信行者。
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩不見諸佛無上正等菩提可信行者，亦不見諸佛無上正等菩提真如可信行者。
translated: This bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not see the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment of the buddhas that can be trusted, nor does he see the suchness of the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment of the buddhas that can be trusted.

original: 「善現！
analyzed: 「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 若成就如是諸行、狀、相，當知是為不退轉菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: If one accomplishes these practices, characteristics, and marks, one should know that this is an irreversible bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: 「復次，善現！
analyzed: 「復次，善現！
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti!

original: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，設有惡魔作苾芻像，來詣其所說如是言：
analyzed: 若不退轉位菩薩摩訶薩，設有惡魔作苾芻像，來詣其所說如是言：
translated: If a non-retrogressive bodhisattva-mahāsattva, even if an evil māra comes to him in the form of a bhikṣu and says to him:

original: 『汝等所行是生死法，非由此得一切智智，汝等今應修盡苦道，速盡眾苦，證般涅槃。
analyzed: 『汝等所行是生死法，非由此得一切智智，汝等今應修盡苦道，速盡眾苦，證般涅槃。
translated: 'What you are practicing is the dharma of birth and death, and by this you will not attain omniscience. You should now practice the path to the end of suffering, quickly end all suffering, and realize parinirvāṇa.'

original: 』是時，惡魔即為菩薩說墮生死相似道法，所謂骨想、或青淤想、或膿爛想、或膖脹想、或蟲食想、或異赤想、或慈、或悲、或喜、或捨、或初靜慮、或乃至第四靜慮、或空無邊處、或乃至非想非非想處，告菩薩言：
analyzed: 』是時，惡魔即為菩薩說墮生死相似道法，所謂骨想、或青淤想、或膿爛想、或膖脹想、或蟲食想、或異赤想、或慈、或悲、或喜、或捨、或初靜慮、或乃至第四靜慮、或空無邊處、或乃至非想非非想處，告菩薩言：
translated: At that time, the evil māra will then speak to the bodhisattva about the dharma of a path that resembles falling into birth and death, namely the conception of bones, or the conception of bluish discoloration, or the conception of pus and rot, or the conception of bloating, or the conception of being eaten by worms, or the conception of a different red color, or loving-kindness, or compassion, or sympathetic joy, or equanimity, or the first concentration, or up to the fourth concentration, or the sphere of infinite space, or up to the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception, and will tell the bodhisattva:

original: 『此是真道真行，汝用此道此行，當得預流果、或一來果、或不還果、或阿羅漢果、或獨覺菩提。
analyzed: 『此是真道真行，汝用此道此行，當得預流果、或一來果、或不還果、或阿羅漢果、或獨覺菩提。
translated: 'This is the true path and true practice. By using this path and this practice, you will attain the fruit of stream-entry, the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, the fruit of arhatship, or the enlightenment of a pratyekabuddha.

original: 汝由此道由此行故，速盡一切生老病死，何用久受生死苦為？
analyzed: 汝由此道由此行故，速盡一切生老病死，何用久受生死苦為？
translated: By this path and by this practice, you will quickly end all birth, old age, sickness, and death. Why endure the suffering of birth and death for a long time?

original: 現在苦身尚應厭捨，況更求受當來苦身！
analyzed: 現在苦身尚應厭捨，況更求受當來苦身！
translated: Even the present painful body should be abandoned, let alone seeking to receive a painful body in the future!

original: 宜自審思捨先所信。
analyzed: 宜自審思捨先所信。
translated: You should carefully consider and abandon your previous faith.'

original: 』「善現！
analyzed: 』「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩聞彼語時，其心不動亦不驚疑，但作是念：
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩聞彼語時，其心不動亦不驚疑，但作是念：
translated: When this bodhisattva-mahāsattva hears these words, his mind remains unmoved and he is not surprised or doubtful. He only thinks:

original: 『今此苾芻益我不少，能為我說相似道法，令我識知此道不能證預流果、或一來果、或不還果、或阿羅漢果、或獨覺菩提，況當能證諸佛無上正等菩提！
analyzed: 『今此苾芻益我不少，能為我說相似道法，令我識知此道不能證預流果、或一來果、或不還果、或阿羅漢果、或獨覺菩提，況當能證諸佛無上正等菩提！
translated: 'Now this bhikṣu has benefited me greatly. He has been able to explain for me a similar path of practice, enabling me to recognize that this path cannot realize the fruit of stream-entry, or the fruit of once-returning, or the fruit of non-returning, or the fruit of arhatship, or pratyekabuddha enlightenment, let alone be able to realize the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment of buddhas!'

original: 』是菩薩摩訶薩作此念已深生歡喜，復作是念：
analyzed: 』是菩薩摩訶薩作此念已深生歡喜，復作是念：
translated: Having had this thought, the bodhisattva-mahāsattva should give rise to great joy. He should further think:

original: 『今此苾芻甚為益我，方便為我說滯礙法，令我了知滯礙法已，於三乘道自在修學。
analyzed: 『今此苾芻甚為益我，方便為我說滯礙法，令我了知滯礙法已，於三乘道自在修學。
translated: 'Now this bhikṣu has greatly benefited me. He has skillfully explained for me the Dharma of obstruction, enabling me to understand the Dharma of obstruction and freely cultivate the practices of the three vehicles.'

original: 』「善現！
analyzed: 』「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 爾時，惡魔知是菩薩深心歡喜，復作是言：
analyzed: 爾時，惡魔知是菩薩深心歡喜，復作是言：
translated: At that time, the evil māra, knowing the bodhisattva's deep joy in his heart, will further say:

original: 『善男子！
analyzed: 『善男子！
translated: 'Good man!

original: 汝欲見諸菩薩摩訶薩長時勤行無益行不？
analyzed: 汝欲見諸菩薩摩訶薩長時勤行無益行不？
translated: Do you wish to see how bodhisattva-mahāsattvas diligently practice for a long time without benefit?

original: 謂諸菩薩摩訶薩眾，經如殑伽沙數大劫，以無量種上妙衣服、飲食、臥具、醫藥、資財、花香等物，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎殑伽沙等諸佛世尊，復於殑伽沙等佛所，修行布施波羅蜜多，修行淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；
analyzed: 謂諸菩薩摩訶薩眾，經如殑伽沙數大劫，以無量種上妙衣服、飲食、臥具、醫藥、資財、花香等物，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎殑伽沙等諸佛世尊，復於殑伽沙等佛所，修行布施波羅蜜多，修行淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多；
translated: It means that the assembly of bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, for eons as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, with immeasurable kinds of excellent clothing, food and drink, bedding, medicine, wealth, flowers, incense and other offerings, make offerings, pay respect, venerate, and praise the buddhas of the worlds of the ten directions, who are as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River. They also practice the perfection of generosity, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of meditation, and the perfection of wisdom in the presence of the buddhas of the worlds of the ten directions, who are as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，學住內空，學住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，學住內空，學住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空；
translated: They also study and abide in inner emptiness, study and abide in outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, conditioned emptiness, unconditioned emptiness, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of common characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature, and emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence in the presence of the buddhas of the worlds of the ten directions, who are as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，學住真如，學住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，學住真如，學住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界；
translated: They also studied abiding in suchness, the realm of the Dharma, the nature of the Dharma, the non-false nature, the unchanging nature, the nature of equality, the nature of detachment from birth, the determination of the Dharma, the abiding of the Dharma, the ultimate reality, the realm of space, and the inconceivable realm, under buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修四念住，修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修四念住，修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支；
translated: They also cultivated the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four bases of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven factors of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path, under buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，學住苦聖諦，學住集、滅、道聖諦；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，學住苦聖諦，學住集、滅、道聖諦；
translated: They also studied abiding in the noble truth of suffering, and studied abiding in the noble truths of the accumulation of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the path to the cessation of suffering, under buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修四靜慮，修四無量、四無色定；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修四靜慮，修四無量、四無色定；
translated: They also cultivated the four meditations, the four immeasurable [minds], and the four formless concentrations, under buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修八解脫，修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修八解脫，修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處；
translated: They also cultivated the eight liberations, the eight superior realms, the nine successive concentrations, and the ten universal bases, under budhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修空解脫門，修無相、無願解脫門；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修空解脫門，修無相、無願解脫門；
translated: They also cultivated the emptiness liberation gate, the signless liberation gate, and the wishless liberation gate in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修極喜地，修離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修極喜地，修離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地；
translated: They also cultivated the ground of extreme joy, the ground of stainlessness, the ground of blazing wisdom, the ground of extremely difficult to conquer, the ground of manifestation, the ground of far-reaching, the ground of immovability, the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of Dharma clouds in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修五眼，修六神通；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修五眼，修六神通；
translated: They also cultivated the five eyes and the six supernormal powers in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修三摩地門，修陀羅尼門；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修三摩地門，修陀羅尼門；
translated: They also cultivated the concentration gate and the dhāraṇī gate in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修佛十力，修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修佛十力，修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法；
translated: They also cultivated the ten powers of the Buddha, the four fearlessnesses, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修無忘失法，修恒住捨性；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修無忘失法，修恒住捨性；
translated: They also cultivated the quality of non-forgetfulness and the nature of constant relinquishment in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修順逆觀十二支緣起；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修順逆觀十二支緣起；
translated: They also contemplated the twelve links of dependent origination in forward and reverse progressions in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River;

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，嚴淨佛土、成熟有情；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，嚴淨佛土、成熟有情；
translated: They also purified buddha-lands and matured sentient beings in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River;

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修諸菩薩殊勝神通；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修諸菩薩殊勝神通；
translated: They also cultivated the excellent spiritual powers of bodhisattvas in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River;

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修圓滿壽量，學轉法輪、護持正法；
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修圓滿壽量，學轉法輪、護持正法；
translated: They also cultivated the complete lifespan, turned the wheel of the Dharma, and upheld the true Dharma in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River;

original: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修一切智，修道相智、一切相智。
analyzed: 亦於殑伽沙等佛所，修一切智，修道相智、一切相智。
translated: They also cultivated omniscience, the cognition of the path, and the cognition of all aspects in the presence of buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River.

original: 「『是諸菩薩摩訶薩眾，亦親近承事如殑伽沙佛，於諸佛所請問菩薩摩訶薩道，謂作是言：
analyzed: 「『是諸菩薩摩訶薩眾，亦親近承事如殑伽沙佛，於諸佛所請問菩薩摩訶薩道，謂作是言：
translated: These bodhisattva-mahāsattvas also attended and served buddhas equal to the sands of the Ganges River, and in the presence of those buddhas they inquired about the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas' path, saying:

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩安住大乘？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩安住大乘？
translated: How do bodhisattva-mahāsattvas abide in the Great Vehicle?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修行布施波羅蜜多，修行淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多？🔽云何菩薩摩訶薩學住內空，學住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修行布施波羅蜜多，修行淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多？ 云何菩薩摩訶薩學住內空，學住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of meditation, and the perfection of wisdom?🔽How do Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas learn to abide in inner emptiness, learn to abide in outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of dispersion, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of specific characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of nature, emptiness of intrinsic nature, and emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩學住真如，學住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩學住真如，學住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas learn to abide in suchness, learn to abide in the dharma realm, the nature of dharmas, the nature of non-deception, the unchanging nature, the nature of equality, the nature of non-arising, the determination of dharmas, the abiding of dharmas, the reality limit, the space element, and the inconceivable element?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修四念住，修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修四念住，修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, cultivate the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of awakening, and eightfold noble path?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩學住苦聖諦，學住集、滅、道聖諦？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩學住苦聖諦，學住集、滅、道聖諦？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas learn to abide in the noble truth of suffering, learn to abide in the noble truths of the arising, cessation, and path [of suffering]?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修四靜慮，修四無量、四無色定？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修四靜慮，修四無量、四無色定？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the four concentrations, cultivate the four immeasurable [minds], and four formless concentrations?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修八解脫，修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修八解脫，修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the eight liberations, cultivate the eight superior [spheres of] perception, nine sequential attainments of concentration, and ten universal bases?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修空解脫門，修無相、無願解脫門？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修空解脫門，修無相、無願解脫門？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the emptiness liberation gate, cultivate the signless and wishless liberation gates?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修極喜地，修離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修極喜地，修離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the ground of joy, cultivate the ground of stainlessness, the ground of blazing wisdom, the ground of the most difficult to conquer, the ground of manifest wisdom, the ground of far-reaching, the ground of immovable, the ground of excellent wisdom, and the cloud of Dharma ground?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修五眼，修六神通？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修五眼，修六神通？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the five eyes and the six supernormal powers?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修三摩地門，修陀羅尼門？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修三摩地門，修陀羅尼門？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the dhāraṇī gateways and the samādhi gateways?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修佛十力，修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修佛十力，修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the ten powers of the Buddha, the four fearlessnesses, the four unobstructed understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修無忘失法，修恒住捨性？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修無忘失法，修恒住捨性？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the power of recollection and the nature of constant relinquishment?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修順逆觀十二支緣起？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修順逆觀十二支緣起？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas contemplate the twelve links of dependent arising in both forward and reverse order?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩嚴淨佛土、成熟有情？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩嚴淨佛土、成熟有情？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas purify buddha-lands and bring sentient beings to maturity?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修諸菩薩殊勝神通？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修諸菩薩殊勝神通？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate the excellent supernormal powers of bodhisattvas?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修圓滿壽量？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修圓滿壽量？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas cultivate a full lifespan?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩學轉大法輪？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩學轉大法輪？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas learn to turn the great wheel of Dharma?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩護持正法令得久住？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩護持正法令得久住？
translated: How do Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas uphold the true Dharma and cause it to endure for a long time?

original: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修一切智，修道相智、一切相智？
analyzed: 云何菩薩摩訶薩修一切智，修道相智、一切相智？
translated: How do bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate omniscience, the cognition of the path, and the cognition of all aspects?

original: 「『殑伽沙等諸佛世尊，如所請問次第為說，是諸菩薩摩訶薩眾，如佛教誨安住修學，經無量劫熾然精進，尚不能得一切智智，況今汝等所修所學，能證無上正等菩提！
analyzed: 「『殑伽沙等諸佛世尊，如所請問次第為說，是諸菩薩摩訶薩眾，如佛教誨安住修學，經無量劫熾然精進，尚不能得一切智智，況今汝等所修所學，能證無上正等菩提！
translated: The buddhas, world-honored ones, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, will explain in sequence according to the questions asked. These bodhisattva-mahāsattva assemblies, abiding in and cultivating according to the Buddha's teachings, for innumerable eons ardently striving, still cannot attain omniscience, let alone that which you now cultivate and learn being able to realize unsurpassed perfect enlightenment!

original: 』「善現！
analyzed: 』「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩雖聞其言而心無異，不驚不恐無疑無惑，倍復歡喜作是念言：
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩雖聞其言而心無異，不驚不恐無疑無惑，倍復歡喜作是念言：
translated: Although this bodhisattva-mahāsattva hears these words, his mind is without difference, not startled, not frightened, without doubt or confusion, and he is doubly delighted, thinking thus:

original: 『今此苾芻多益於我，方便為我說障道法，令我知此障道之法決定不能證預流果、或一來果、或不還果、或阿羅漢果、或獨覺菩提，況能證得一切智智！
analyzed: 『今此苾芻多益於我，方便為我說障道法，令我知此障道之法決定不能證預流果、或一來果、或不還果、或阿羅漢果、或獨覺菩提，況能證得一切智智！
translated: 'This bhikṣu has benefited me greatly. He has skillfully taught me the Dharma that obstructs the path, enabling me to know that this Dharma that obstructs the path definitely cannot lead to the realization of the fruit of stream-entry, the fruit of once-returning, the fruit of non-returning, the fruit of arhatship, or pratyekabuddha enlightenment, let alone the realization of omniscience!'

original: 』「善現！
analyzed: 』「善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 時，彼惡魔知是菩薩心不退屈無怖無疑，即於是處化作無量苾芻形像，語菩薩言：
analyzed: 時，彼惡魔知是菩薩心不退屈無怖無疑，即於是處化作無量苾芻形像，語菩薩言：
translated: At that time, the evil māra, knowing that this bodhisattva's mind is not discouraged, fearless, and free from doubt, then conjures up countless images of bhikṣus right there and says to the bodhisattva:

original: 『此諸苾芻皆於過去希求無上正等菩提，經無量劫修行種種難行苦行而不能得，今皆退住阿羅漢果，諸漏已盡至苦邊際，云何汝等能證無上正等菩提？
analyzed: 『此諸苾芻皆於過去希求無上正等菩提，經無量劫修行種種難行苦行而不能得，今皆退住阿羅漢果，諸漏已盡至苦邊際，云何汝等能證無上正等菩提？
translated: 'All these bhikṣus in the past sought unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, practiced various difficult and painful practices for innumerable eons but were unable to attain it, and now all have turned back and abide in the fruit of arhatship. Their defilements have already ended and they have reached the end of suffering. How can you attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment?'

original: 』善現！
analyzed: 』善現！
translated: Subhūti!

original: 是菩薩摩訶薩見聞此已即作是念：
analyzed: 是菩薩摩訶薩見聞此已即作是念：
translated: At that time, this bodhisattva mahāsattva, having seen and heard this, immediately thinks:

original: 『定是惡魔化作如此苾芻形像擾亂我心，因說滯礙相似道法，必無菩薩摩訶薩眾修行般若波羅蜜多至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提，退墮聲聞或獨覺地。
analyzed: 『定是惡魔化作如此苾芻形像擾亂我心，因說滯礙相似道法，必無菩薩摩訶薩眾修行般若波羅蜜多至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提，退墮聲聞或獨覺地。
translated: 'This must be a wicked demon who has transformed into the appearance of a bhikṣu to disturb my mind, speaking of an obstructed similar path. It is definitely not the case that a bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices prajñāpāramitā will not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, but will fall back to the stage of śrāvakas or pratyekabuddhas.'

original: 』「爾時，菩薩復作是念：
analyzed: 』「爾時，菩薩復作是念：
translated: At that time, the bodhisattva further thought like this:

original: 『若菩薩摩訶薩修行布施波羅蜜多，修行淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 『若菩薩摩訶薩修行布施波羅蜜多，修行淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: 'If a bodhisattva mahāsattva practices the perfection of generosity, practices the perfections of morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and prajñā until they are fully perfected, and does not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, it is definitely not the case.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩學住內空，學住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩學住內空，學住外空、內外空、空空、大空、勝義空、有為空、無為空、畢竟空、無際空、散空、無變異空、本性空、自相空、共相空、一切法空、不可得空、無性空、自性空、無性自性空至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas study to abide in inner emptiness, study to abide in outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness, emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, absolute emptiness, emptiness without beginning or end, emptiness of separation, emptiness of inherent existence, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of common characteristics, emptiness of all phenomena, emptiness of non-apprehension, emptiness of intrinsic nature, emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence, and emptiness of the intrinsic nature of non-existence of intrinsic nature, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, it is absolutely impossible.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩學住真如，學住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩學住真如，學住法界、法性、不虛妄性、不變異性、平等性、離生性、法定、法住、實際、虛空界、不思議界至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas study to abide in suchness, study to abide in the dharma realm, dharma nature, non-false nature, unchanging nature, equality, nature of non-arising, dharma determination, dharma abiding, reality limit, space realm, and inconceivable realm, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, it is absolutely impossible.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修四念住，修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修四念住，修四正斷、四神足、五根、五力、七等覺支、八聖道支至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the four establishments of mindfulness, cultivate the four right efforts, four bases of supernatural power, five faculties, five powers, seven factors of enlightenment, and eightfold noble path to the stage of completion, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, this is impossible.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩學住苦聖諦，學住集、滅、道聖諦至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩學住苦聖諦，學住集、滅、道聖諦至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas study to abide in the noble truth of suffering, study to abide in the noble truths of the accumulation [of suffering], cessation [of suffering], and the path [to the cessation of suffering] to the stage of completion, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, this is impossible.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修四靜慮，修四無量、四無色定至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修四靜慮，修四無量、四無色定至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the four meditations, cultivate the four immeasurable [minds] and four formless concentrations to the stage of completion, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, this is impossible.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修八解脫，修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修八解脫，修八勝處、九次第定、十遍處至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the eight liberations, cultivate the eight superior [meditations], nine sequential [meditations], and ten universal [meditations] to the stage of completion, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, this is impossible.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修空解脫門，修無相、無願解脫門至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修空解脫門，修無相、無願解脫門至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the door of liberation of emptiness, cultivate the door of liberation of signlessness and wishlessness until reaching the stage of completion, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, it will definitely not happen.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修極喜地，修離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修極喜地，修離垢地、發光地、焰慧地、極難勝地、現前地、遠行地、不動地、善慧地、法雲地至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the ground of extreme joy, cultivate the ground of stainlessness, the ground of blazing wisdom, the ground of extremely difficult to conquer, the ground of manifest realization, the ground of far-reaching, the ground of immovable, the ground of excellent wisdom, and the ground of cloud of Dharma until reaching the stage of completion, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, it will definitely not happen.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修五眼，修六神通至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修五眼，修六神通至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the five eyes, cultivate the six supernormal powers until reaching the stage of completion, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, it will definitely not happen.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修三摩地門，修陀羅尼門至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修三摩地門，修陀羅尼門至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the door of concentration, cultivate the dhāraṇī door until reaching the stage of completion, and do not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment, it will definitely not happen.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修佛十力，修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修佛十力，修四無所畏、四無礙解、大慈、大悲、大喜、大捨、十八佛不共法至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the ten powers of a buddha, cultivate the four fearlessnesses, four unimpeded understandings, great kindness, great compassion, great joy, great equanimity, and the eighteen distinctive abilities of a buddha, and reach the stage of completion, it is impossible that they will not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修無忘失法，修恒住捨性至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修無忘失法，修恒住捨性至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the power of recollection and the nature of constant relinquishment, and reach the stage of completion, it is impossible that they will not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩修順逆觀十二支緣起至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩修順逆觀十二支緣起至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
translated: If bodhisattva-mahāsattvas cultivate the forward and reverse observation of the twelve links of dependent arising, and reach the stage of completion, it is impossible that they will not attain unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 若菩薩摩訶薩嚴淨佛土、成熟有情至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
analyzed: 若菩薩摩訶薩嚴淨佛土、成熟有情至圓滿位，不得無上正等菩提必無是處；
